123std::string talk_trial::name() const
124{
125 static const std::array<std::string, NUM_TALK_TRIALS> texts = { {
126 "", translate_marker( "LIE" ), translate_marker( "PERSUADE" ), translate_marker( "INTIMIDATE" ), ""
127 }
128 };
129 if( static_cast<size_t>( type ) >= texts.size() ) {
130 debugmsg( "invalid trial type %d", static_cast<int>( type ) );
131 return std::string();
132 }
133 return texts[type].empty() ? std::string() : _( texts[type] );
134}

136/** Time (in turns) and cost (in cent) for training: */
137time_duration calc_skill_training_time( const npc &p, const skill_id &skill )
138{
139 return 1_minutes + 30_seconds * g->u.get_skill_level( skill ) -
140 1_seconds * p.get_skill_level( skill );
141}
142
143int calc_skill_training_cost( const npc &p, const skill_id &skill )
144{
145 if( p.is_player_ally() ) {
146 return 0;
147 }
148
149 return 1000 * ( 1 + g->u.get_skill_level( skill ) ) * ( 1 + g->u.get_skill_level( skill ) );
150}
151
152// TODO: all styles cost the same and take the same time to train,
153// maybe add values to the ma_style class to makes this variable
154// TODO: maybe move this function into the ma_style class? Or into the NPC class?
155time_duration calc_ma_style_training_time( const npc &, const matype_id & /* id */ )
156{
157 return 30_minutes;
158}
159
160int calc_ma_style_training_cost( const npc &p, const matype_id & /* id */ )
161{
162 if( p.is_player_ally() ) {
163 return 0;
164 }
165
166 return 800;
167}
168
169int npc::calc_spell_training_cost( const bool knows, int difficulty, int level )
170{
171 if( is_player_ally() ) {
172 return 0;
173 }
174 int ret = ( 100 * std::max( 1, difficulty ) * std::max( 1, level ) );
175 if( !knows ) {
176 ret = ret * 2;
177 }
178 return ret;
179}

181// Rescale values from "mission scale" to "opinion scale"
182int npc_trading::cash_to_favor( const npc &, int cash )
183{
184 // TODO: It should affect different NPCs to a different degree
185 // Square root of mission value in dollars
186 // ~31 for zed mom, 50 for horde master, ~63 for plutonium cells
187 double scaled_mission_val = std::sqrt( cash / 100.0 );
188 return roll_remainder( scaled_mission_val );
189}

216// given a vector of NPCs, presents a menu to allow a player to pick one.
217// everyone == true adds another entry at the end to allow selecting all listed NPCs
218// this implies a return value of npc_list.size() means "everyone"
219static int npc_select_menu( const std::vector<npc *> &npc_list, const std::string &prompt,
220 const bool everyone = true )
221{
222 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
223 return -1;
224 }
225 const int npc_count = npc_list.size();
226 if( npc_count == 1 ) {
227 return 0;
228 } else {
229 uilist nmenu;
230 nmenu.text = prompt;
231 for( auto &elem : npc_list ) {
232 nmenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, ( elem )->name );
233 }
234 if( npc_count > 1 && everyone ) {
235 nmenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Everyone" ) );
236 }
237 nmenu.query();
238 return nmenu.ret;
239 }
240
241}

243static void npc_batch_override_toggle(
244 const std::vector<npc *> &npc_list, ally_rule rule, bool state )
245{
246 for( npc *p : npc_list ) {
247 p->rules.toggle_specific_override_state( rule, state );
248 }

251static void npc_temp_orders_menu( const std::vector<npc *> &npc_list )
252{
253 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
254 return;
255 }
256 npc *guy = npc_list.front();
257
258 bool done = false;
259 uilist nmenu;
260
261 while( !done ) {
262 int override_count = 0;
263 std::string output_string = string_format( _( "%s currently has these temporary orders:" ),
264 guy->name );
265 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
266 if( guy->rules.has_override_enable( rule.second.rule ) ) {
267 override_count++;
268 output_string += "\n ";
269 output_string += ( guy->rules.has_override( rule.second.rule ) ? rule.second.rule_true_text :
270 rule.second.rule_false_text );
271 }
272 }
273 if( override_count == 0 ) {
274 output_string += std::string( "\n " ) + _( "None." ) + "\n";
275 }
276 if( npc_list.size() > 1 ) {
277 output_string += std::string( "\n" ) +
278 _( "Other followers might have different temporary orders." );
279 }
280 nmenu.reset();
281 nmenu.text = _( "Issue what temporary order?" );
282 nmenu.desc_enabled = true;
283 parse_tags( output_string, g->u, *guy );
284 nmenu.footer_text = output_string;
285 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_DONE, true, 'd', _( "Done issuing orders" ) );
286 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_FORBID_ENGAGE, true, 'f',
287 guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::forbid_engage ) ?
288 _( "Go back to your usual engagement habits" ) : _( "Don't engage hostiles for the time being" ) );
289 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_NO_GUNS, true, 'g', guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::use_guns ) ?
290 _( "Use whatever weapon you normally would" ) : _( "Don't use ranged weapons for a while" ) );
291 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_PULP, true, 'p', guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::allow_pulp ) ?
292 _( "Pulp zombies if you like" ) : _( "Hold off on pulping zombies for a while" ) );
293 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_FOLLOW_CLOSE, true, 'c',
294 guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::follow_close ) &&
295 guy->rules.has_override( ally_rule::follow_close ) ?
296 _( "Go back to keeping your usual distance" ) : _( "Stick close to me for now" ) );
297 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_MOVE_FREELY, true, 'm',
298 guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::follow_close ) &&
299 !guy->rules.has_override( ally_rule::follow_close ) ?
300 _( "Go back to keeping your usual distance" ) : _( "Move farther from me if you need to" ) );
301 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_SLEEP, true, 's',
302 guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::allow_sleep ) ?
303 _( "Go back to your usual sleeping habits" ) : _( "Take a nap if you need it" ) );
304 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_CLEAR_OVERRIDES, true, 'o', _( "Let's go back to your usual behaviors" ) );
305 nmenu.query();
306
307 switch( nmenu.ret ) {
308 case NPC_CHAT_FORBID_ENGAGE:
309 npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::forbid_engage, true );
310 break;
311 case NPC_CHAT_NO_GUNS:
312 npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::use_guns, false );
313 break;
314 case NPC_CHAT_PULP:
315 npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::allow_pulp, false );
316 break;
317 case NPC_CHAT_FOLLOW_CLOSE:
318 npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::follow_close, true );
319 break;
320 case NPC_CHAT_MOVE_FREELY:
321 npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::follow_close, false );
322 break;
323 case NPC_CHAT_SLEEP:
324 npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::allow_sleep, true );
325 break;
326 case NPC_CHAT_CLEAR_OVERRIDES:
327 for( npc *p : npc_list ) {
328 p->rules.clear_overrides();
329 }
330 break;
331 default:
332 done = true;
333 break;
334 }
335 }
336
337}

339static void tell_veh_stop_following()
340{
341 for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : g->m.get_vehicles() ) {
342 vehicle *v = veh.v;
343 if( v->has_engine_type( fuel_type_animal, false ) && v->is_owned_by( g->u ) ) {
344 v->is_following = false;
345 v->engine_on = false;
346 }
347 }
348}
349
350static void assign_veh_to_follow()
351{
352 for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : g->m.get_vehicles() ) {
353 vehicle *v = veh.v;
354 if( v->has_engine_type( fuel_type_animal, false ) && v->is_owned_by( g->u ) ) {
355 v->activate_animal_follow();
356 }
357 }
358}
359
360static void tell_magic_veh_to_follow()
361{
362 for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : g->m.get_vehicles() ) {
363 vehicle *v = veh.v;
364 if( v->magic ) {
365 for( const vpart_reference &vp : v->get_all_parts() ) {
366 const vpart_info &vpi = vp.info();
367 if( vpi.has_flag( "MAGIC_FOLLOW" ) && v->is_owned_by( g->u ) ) {
368 v->activate_magical_follow();
369 break;
370 }
371 }
372 }
373 }
374}
375
376static void tell_magic_veh_stop_following()
377{
378 for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : g->m.get_vehicles() ) {
379 vehicle *v = veh.v;
380 if( v->magic ) {
381 for( const vpart_reference &vp : v->get_all_parts() ) {
382 const vpart_info &vpi = vp.info();
383 if( vpi.has_flag( "MAGIC_FOLLOW" ) ) {
384 v->is_following = false;
385 v->engine_on = false;
386 break;
387 }
388 }
389 }
390 }

392
393void game::chat()
394{
395 int volume = g->u.get_shout_volume();
396
397 const std::vector<npc *> available = get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
398 // TODO: Get rid of the z-level check when z-level vision gets "better"
399 return u.posz() == guy.posz() && u.sees( guy.pos() ) &&
400 rl_dist( u.pos(), guy.pos() ) <= SEEX * 2;
401 } );
402 const int available_count = available.size();
403 const std::vector<npc *> followers = get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
404 return guy.is_player_ally() && guy.is_following() && guy.can_hear( u.pos(), volume );
405 } );
406 const int follower_count = followers.size();
407 const std::vector<npc *> guards = get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
408 return guy.mission == NPC_MISSION_GUARD_ALLY &&
409 guy.companion_mission_role_id != "FACTION_CAMP" &&
410 guy.can_hear( u.pos(), volume );
411 } );
412 const int guard_count = guards.size();
413
414 if( g->u.has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) && !( g->u.is_wearing( itype_id( "foodperson_mask" ) ) ||
415 g->u.is_wearing( itype_id( "foodperson_mask_on" ) ) ) ) {
416 g->u.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You can't speak without your face!" ) );
417 return;
418 }
419 std::vector<vehicle *> animal_vehicles;
420 std::vector<vehicle *> following_vehicles;
421 std::vector<vehicle *> magic_vehicles;
422 std::vector<vehicle *> magic_following_vehicles;
423 for( auto &veh : g->m.get_vehicles() ) {
424 auto &v = veh.v;
425 if( v->has_engine_type( fuel_type_animal, false ) && v->is_owned_by( g->u ) ) {
426 animal_vehicles.push_back( v );
427 if( v->is_following ) {
428 following_vehicles.push_back( v );
429 }
430 }
431 if( v->magic ) {
432 for( const vpart_reference &vp : v->get_all_parts() ) {
433 const vpart_info &vpi = vp.info();
434 if( vpi.has_flag( "MAGIC_FOLLOW" ) ) {
435 magic_vehicles.push_back( v );
436 if( v->is_following ) {
437 magic_following_vehicles.push_back( v );
438 }
439 break;
440 }
441 }
442 }
443 }
444
445 uilist nmenu;
446 nmenu.text = std::string( _( "What do you want to do?" ) );
447
448 if( !available.empty() ) {
449 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_TALK, true, 't', available_count == 1 ?
450 string_format( _( "Talk to %s" ), available.front()->name ) :
451 _( "Talk to…" )
452 );
453 }
454 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_YELL, true, 'a', _( "Yell" ) );
455 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_SENTENCE, true, 'b', _( "Yell a sentence" ) );
456 if( !animal_vehicles.empty() ) {
457 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ANIMAL_VEHICLE_FOLLOW, true, 'F',
458 _( "Whistle at your animals pulling vehicles to follow you." ) );
459 }
460 if( !magic_vehicles.empty() ) {
461 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_COMMAND_MAGIC_VEHICLE_FOLLOW, true, 'Q',
462 _( "Utter a magical command that will order your magical vehicles to follow you." ) );
463 }
464 if( !magic_following_vehicles.empty() ) {
465 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_COMMAND_MAGIC_VEHICLE_STOP_FOLLOW, true, 'q',
466 _( "Utter a magical command that will order your magical vehicles to stop following you." ) );
467 }
468 if( !following_vehicles.empty() ) {
469 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ANIMAL_VEHICLE_STOP_FOLLOW, true, 'S',
470 _( "Whistle at your animals pulling vehicles to stop following you." ) );
471 }
472 if( !guards.empty() ) {
473 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_FOLLOW, true, 'f', guard_count == 1 ?
474 string_format( _( "Tell %s to follow" ), guards.front()->name ) :
475 _( "Tell someone to follow…" )
476 );
477 }
478 if( !followers.empty() ) {
479 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_GUARD, true, 'g', follower_count == 1 ?
480 string_format( _( "Tell %s to guard" ), followers.front()->name ) :
481 _( "Tell someone to guard…" )
482 );
483 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_AWAKE, true, 'w', _( "Tell everyone on your team to wake up" ) );
484 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_MOUNT, true, 'M', _( "Tell everyone on your team to mount up" ) );
485 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_DISMOUNT, true, 'm', _( "Tell everyone on your team to dismount" ) );
486 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_DANGER, true, 'D',
487 _( "Tell everyone on your team to prepare for danger" ) );
488 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_CLEAR_OVERRIDES, true, 'r',
489 _( "Tell everyone on your team to relax (Clear Overrides)" ) );
490 nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ORDERS, true, 'o', _( "Tell everyone on your team to temporarily…" ) );
491 }
492 std::string message;
493 std::string yell_msg;
494 bool is_order = true;
495 nmenu.query();
496
497 if( nmenu.ret < 0 ) {
498 return;
499 }
500
501 switch( nmenu.ret ) {
502 case NPC_CHAT_TALK: {
503 const int npcselect = npc_select_menu( available, _( "Talk to whom?" ), false );
504 if( npcselect < 0 ) {
505 return;
506 }
507 available[npcselect]->talk_to_u();
508 break;
509 }
510 case NPC_CHAT_YELL:
511 is_order = false;
512 message = _( "loudly." );
513 break;
514 case NPC_CHAT_SENTENCE: {
515 std::string popupdesc = _( "Enter a sentence to yell" );
516 string_input_popup popup;
517 popup.title( _( "Yell a sentence" ) )
518 .width( 64 )
519 .description( popupdesc )
520 .identifier( "sentence" )
521 .max_length( 128 )
522 .query();
523 yell_msg = popup.text();
524 is_order = false;
525 break;
526 }
527 case NPC_CHAT_GUARD: {
528 const int npcselect = npc_select_menu( followers, _( "Who should guard here?" ) );
529 if( npcselect < 0 ) {
530 return;
531 }
532 if( npcselect == follower_count ) {
533 for( npc *them : followers ) {
534 talk_function::assign_guard( *them );
535 }
536 yell_msg = _( "Everyone guard here!" );
537 } else {
538 talk_function::assign_guard( *followers[npcselect] );
539 yell_msg = string_format( _( "Guard here, %s!" ), followers[npcselect]->name );
540 }
541 break;
542 }
543 case NPC_CHAT_FOLLOW: {
544 const int npcselect = npc_select_menu( guards, _( "Who should follow you?" ) );
545 if( npcselect < 0 ) {
546 return;
547 }
548 if( npcselect == guard_count ) {
549 for( npc *them : guards ) {
550 talk_function::stop_guard( *them );
551 }
552 yell_msg = _( "Everyone follow me!" );
553 } else {
554 talk_function::stop_guard( *guards[npcselect] );
555 yell_msg = string_format( _( "Follow me, %s!" ), guards[npcselect]->name );
556 }
557 break;
558 }
559 case NPC_CHAT_AWAKE:
560 for( npc *them : followers ) {
561 talk_function::wake_up( *them );
562 }
563 yell_msg = _( "Stay awake!" );
564 break;
565 case NPC_CHAT_MOUNT:
566 for( npc *them : followers ) {
567 if( them->has_effect( effect_riding ) ) {
568 continue;
569 }
570 talk_function::find_mount( *them );
571 }
572 yell_msg = _( "Mount up!" );
573 break;
574 case NPC_CHAT_DISMOUNT:
575 for( npc *them : followers ) {
576 if( them->has_effect( effect_riding ) ) {
577 them->npc_dismount();
578 }
579 }
580 yell_msg = _( "Dismount!" );
581 break;
582 case NPC_CHAT_DANGER:
583 for( npc *them : followers ) {
584 them->rules.set_danger_overrides();
585 }
586 yell_msg = _( "We're in danger. Stay awake, stay close, don't go wandering off, "
587 "and don't open any doors." );
588 break;
589 case NPC_CHAT_CLEAR_OVERRIDES:
590 for( npc *p : followers ) {
591 talk_function::clear_overrides( *p );
592 }
593 yell_msg = _( "As you were." );
594 break;
595 case NPC_CHAT_ORDERS:
596 npc_temp_orders_menu( followers );
597 break;
598 case NPC_CHAT_ANIMAL_VEHICLE_FOLLOW:
599 assign_veh_to_follow();
600 break;
601 case NPC_CHAT_ANIMAL_VEHICLE_STOP_FOLLOW:
602 tell_veh_stop_following();
603 break;
604 case NPC_CHAT_COMMAND_MAGIC_VEHICLE_FOLLOW:
605 tell_magic_veh_to_follow();
606 break;
607 case NPC_CHAT_COMMAND_MAGIC_VEHICLE_STOP_FOLLOW:
608 tell_magic_veh_stop_following();
609 break;
610 default:
611 return;
612 }
613
614 if( !yell_msg.empty() ) {
615 message = string_format( "\"%s\"", yell_msg );
616 }
617 if( !message.empty() ) {
618 add_msg( _( "You yell %s" ), message );
619 u.shout( string_format( _( "%s yelling %s" ), u.disp_name(), message ), is_order );
620 }
621
622 u.moves -= 100;
623}
624
625void npc::handle_sound( const sounds::sound_t spriority, const std::string &description,
626 int heard_volume, const tripoint &spos )
627{
628 const tripoint s_abs_pos = g->m.getabs( spos );
629 const tripoint my_abs_pos = g->m.getabs( pos() );
630
631 add_msg( m_debug, "%s heard '%s', priority %d at volume %d from %d:%d, my pos %d:%d",
632 disp_name(), description, static_cast<int>( spriority ), heard_volume,
633 s_abs_pos.x, s_abs_pos.y, my_abs_pos.x, my_abs_pos.y );
634
635 bool player_ally = g->u.pos() == spos && is_player_ally();
636 player *const sound_source = g->critter_at<player>( spos );
637 bool npc_ally = sound_source && sound_source->is_npc() && is_ally( *sound_source );
638
639 if( ( player_ally || npc_ally ) && spriority == sounds::sound_t::order ) {
640 say( "<acknowledged>" );
641 }
642
643 if( sees( spos ) || is_hallucination() ) {
644 return;
645 }
646 // ignore low priority sounds if the NPC "knows" it came from a friend.
647 // TODO: NPC will need to respond to talking noise eventually
648 // but only for bantering purposes, not for investigating.
649 if( spriority < sounds::sound_t::alarm ) {
650 if( player_ally ) {
651 add_msg( m_debug, "Allied NPC ignored same faction %s", name );
652 return;
653 }
654 if( npc_ally ) {
655 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC ignored same faction %s", name );
656 return;
657 }
658 }
659 // discount if sound source is player, or seen by player,
660 // and listener is friendly and sound source is combat or alert only.
661 if( spriority < sounds::sound_t::alarm && g->u.sees( spos ) ) {
662 if( is_player_ally() ) {
663 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s ignored low priority noise that player can see", name );
664 return;
665 // discount if sound source is player, or seen by player,
666 // listener is neutral and sound type is worth investigating.
667 } else if( spriority < sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity &&
668 get_attitude_group( get_attitude() ) != attitude_group::hostile ) {
669 return;
670 }
671 }
672 // patrolling guards will investigate more readily than stationary NPCS
673 int investigate_dist = 10;
674 if( mission == NPC_MISSION_GUARD_ALLY || mission == NPC_MISSION_GUARD_PATROL ) {
675 investigate_dist = 50;
676 }
677 if( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::ignore_noise ) ) {
678 investigate_dist = 0;
679 }
680 if( ai_cache.total_danger < 1.0f ) {
681 if( spriority == sounds::sound_t::movement && !in_vehicle ) {
682 warn_about( "movement_noise", rng( 1, 10 ) * 1_minutes, description );
683 } else if( spriority > sounds::sound_t::movement ) {
684 if( ( spriority == sounds::sound_t::speech || spriority == sounds::sound_t::alert ||
685 spriority == sounds::sound_t::order ) && sound_source &&
686 !has_faction_relationship( *sound_source, npc_factions::knows_your_voice ) ) {
687 warn_about( "speech_noise", rng( 1, 10 ) * 1_minutes );
688 } else if( spriority > sounds::sound_t::activity ) {
689 warn_about( "combat_noise", rng( 1, 10 ) * 1_minutes );
690 }
691 bool should_check = rl_dist( pos(), spos ) < investigate_dist;
692 if( should_check ) {
693 const zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
694 if( mgr.has( zone_type_npc_no_investigate, s_abs_pos, fac_id ) ) {
695 should_check = false;
696 } else if( mgr.has( zone_type_npc_investigate_only, my_abs_pos, fac_id ) &&
697 !mgr.has( zone_type_npc_investigate_only, s_abs_pos, fac_id ) ) {
698 should_check = false;
699 }
700 }
701 if( should_check ) {
702 add_msg( m_debug, "%s added noise at pos %d:%d", name, s_abs_pos.x, s_abs_pos.y );
703 dangerous_sound temp_sound;
704 temp_sound.abs_pos = s_abs_pos;
705 temp_sound.volume = heard_volume;
706 temp_sound.type = spriority;
707 if( !ai_cache.sound_alerts.empty() ) {
708 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.back().abs_pos != s_abs_pos ) {
709 ai_cache.sound_alerts.push_back( temp_sound );
710 }
711 } else {
712 ai_cache.sound_alerts.push_back( temp_sound );
713 }
714 }
715 }
716 }
717}
718
719void npc_chatbin::check_missions()
720{
721 // TODO: or simply fail them? Some missions might only need to be reported.
722 auto &ma = missions_assigned;
723 const auto last = std::remove_if( ma.begin(), ma.end(), []( class mission const * m ) {
724 return !m->is_assigned();
725 } );
726 std::copy( last, ma.end(), std::back_inserter( missions ) );
727 ma.erase( last, ma.end() );
728}
729
730void npc::talk_to_u( bool radio_contact )
731{
732 if( g->u.is_dead_state() ) {
733 set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
734 return;
735 }
736 const bool has_mind_control = g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL );
737 // This is necessary so that we don't bug the player over and over
738 if( get_attitude() == NPCATT_TALK ) {
739 set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
740 } else if( !has_mind_control && ( get_attitude() == NPCATT_FLEE ||
741 get_attitude() == NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ) ) {
742 add_msg( _( "%s is fleeing from you!" ), name );
743 return;
744 } else if( !has_mind_control && get_attitude() == NPCATT_KILL ) {
745 add_msg( _( "%s is hostile!" ), name );
746 return;
747 }
748 if( get_faction() ) {
749 get_faction()->known_by_u = true;
750 }
751 set_known_to_u( true );
752 dialogue d;
753 d.alpha = &g->u;
754 d.beta = this;
755
756 chatbin.check_missions();
757
758 // For each active mission we have, let the mission know we talked to this NPC.
759 for( auto &mission : g->u.get_active_missions() ) {
760 mission->on_talk_with_npc( this->getID() );
761 }
762
763 for( auto &mission : chatbin.missions_assigned ) {
764 if( mission->get_assigned_player_id() == g->u.getID() ) {
765 d.missions_assigned.push_back( mission );
766 }
767 }
768 d.add_topic( chatbin.first_topic );
769 if( radio_contact ) {
770 d.add_topic( "TALK_RADIO" );
771 d.by_radio = true;
772 } else if( is_leader() ) {
773 d.add_topic( "TALK_LEADER" );
774 } else if( is_player_ally() && ( is_walking_with() || has_activity() ) ) {
775 d.add_topic( "TALK_FRIEND" );
776 } else if( get_attitude() == NPCATT_RECOVER_GOODS ) {
777 d.add_topic( "TALK_STOLE_ITEM" );
778 }
779 g->u.dialogue_by_radio = d.by_radio;
780 int most_difficult_mission = 0;
781 for( auto &mission : chatbin.missions ) {
782 const auto &type = mission->get_type();
783 if( type.urgent && type.difficulty > most_difficult_mission ) {
784 d.add_topic( "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE_URGENT" );
785 chatbin.mission_selected = mission;
786 most_difficult_mission = type.difficulty;
787 }
788 }
789 most_difficult_mission = 0;
790 bool chosen_urgent = false;
791 for( auto &mission : chatbin.missions_assigned ) {
792 if( mission->get_assigned_player_id() != g->u.getID() ) {
793 // Not assigned to the player that is currently talking to the npc
794 continue;
795 }
796 const auto &type = mission->get_type();
797 if( ( type.urgent && !chosen_urgent ) || ( type.difficulty > most_difficult_mission &&
798 ( type.urgent || !chosen_urgent ) ) ) {
799 chosen_urgent = type.urgent;
800 d.add_topic( "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE" );
801 chatbin.mission_selected = mission;
802 most_difficult_mission = type.difficulty;
803 }
804 }
805
806 // Needs
807 if( has_effect( effect_npc_suspend ) ) {
808 d.add_topic( "TALK_REBOOT" );
809 }
810 if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) || has_effect( effect_lying_down ) ) {
811 if( has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
812 d.add_topic( "TALK_SEDATED" );
813 } else {
814 d.add_topic( "TALK_WAKE_UP" );
815 }
816 }
817
818 if( d.topic_stack.back().id == "TALK_NONE" ) {
819 d.topic_stack.back() = talk_topic( pick_talk_topic( g->u ) );
820 }
821
822 moves -= 100;
823
824 if( g->u.is_deaf() ) {
825 if( d.topic_stack.back().id == "TALK_MUG" ||
826 d.topic_stack.back().id == "TALK_STRANGER_AGGRESSIVE" ) {
827 make_angry();
828 d.add_topic( "TALK_DEAF_ANGRY" );
829 } else {
830 d.add_topic( "TALK_DEAF" );
831 }
832 }
833
834 if( g->u.has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) && !( g->u.is_wearing( itype_id( "foodperson_mask" ) ) ||
835 g->u.is_wearing( itype_id( "foodperson_mask_on" ) ) ) ) {
836 d.add_topic( "TALK_NOFACE" );
837 }
838
839 if( has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) && !( is_wearing( itype_id( "foodperson_mask" ) ) ||
840 is_wearing( itype_id( "foodperson_mask_on" ) ) ) ) {
841 d.add_topic( "TALK_NPC_NOFACE" );
842 }
843
844 decide_needs();
845
846 dialogue_window d_win;
847 // Main dialogue loop
848 do {
849 if( chatbin.mission_selected != nullptr ) {
850 if( chatbin.mission_selected->get_assigned_player_id() != g->u.getID() ) {
851 // Don't talk about a mission that is assigned to someone else.
852 chatbin.mission_selected = nullptr;
853 }
854 }
855 if( chatbin.mission_selected == nullptr ) {
856 // if possible, select a mission to talk about
857 if( !chatbin.missions.empty() ) {
858 chatbin.mission_selected = chatbin.missions.front();
859 } else if( !d.missions_assigned.empty() ) {
860 chatbin.mission_selected = d.missions_assigned.front();
861 }
862 }
863 const talk_topic next = d.opt( d_win, name, d.topic_stack.back() );
864 if( next.id == "TALK_NONE" ) {
865 int cat = topic_category( d.topic_stack.back() );
866 do {
867 d.topic_stack.pop_back();
868 } while( cat != -1 && topic_category( d.topic_stack.back() ) == cat );
869 }
870 if( next.id == "TALK_DONE" || d.topic_stack.empty() ) {
871 d.beta->say( _( "Bye." ) );
872 d.done = true;
873 } else if( next.id != "TALK_NONE" ) {
874 d.add_topic( next );
875 }
876 } while( !d.done );
877
878 if( g->u.activity.id() == ACT_AIM && !g->u.has_weapon() ) {
879 g->u.cancel_activity();
880 // don't query certain activities that are started from dialogue
881 } else if( g->u.activity.id() == ACT_TRAIN ||
882 g->u.activity.id() == ACT_WAIT_NPC ||
883 g->u.activity.id() == ACT_SOCIALIZE ||
884 g->u.activity.index == getID().get_value() ) {
885 return;
886 }
887
888 if( !g->u.has_effect( effect_under_op ) ) {
889 g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::talked_to,
890 string_format( _( "%s talked to you." ), name ) );
891 }
892}
893
894std::string dialogue::dynamic_line( const talk_topic &the_topic ) const
895{
896 if( !the_topic.item_type.is_null() ) {
897 cur_item = the_topic.item_type;
898 }
899
900 // For compatibility
901 const auto &topic = the_topic.id;
902 const auto iter = json_talk_topics.find( topic );
903 if( iter != json_talk_topics.end() ) {
904 const std::string line = iter->second.get_dynamic_line( *this );
905 if( !line.empty() ) {
906 return line;
907 }
908 }
909
910 if( topic == "TALK_NPC_NOFACE" ) {
911 return string_format( _( "&%s stays silent." ), beta->name );
912 }
913
914 if( topic == "TALK_NOFACE" ) {
915 return _( "&You can't talk without your face." );
916 } else if( topic == "TALK_DEAF" ) {
917 return _( "&You are deaf and can't talk." );
918
919 } else if( topic == "TALK_DEAF_ANGRY" ) {
920 return string_format(
921 _( "&You are deaf and can't talk. When you don't respond, %s becomes angry!" ),
922 beta->name );
923 }
924 if( topic == "TALK_SEDATED" ) {
925 return string_format(
926 _( "%1$s is sedated and can't be moved or woken up until the medication or sedation wears off.\nYou estimate it will wear off in %2$s." ),
927 beta->name, to_string_approx( g->u.estimate_effect_dur( skill_id( "firstaid" ), effect_narcosis,
928 15_minutes, 6, *beta ) ) );
929 }
930
931 const auto &p = beta; // for compatibility, later replace it in the code below
932 // Those topics are handled by the mission system, see there.
933 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> mission_topics = { {
934 "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE", "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE_URGENT",
935 "TALK_MISSION_OFFER", "TALK_MISSION_ACCEPTED",
936 "TALK_MISSION_REJECTED", "TALK_MISSION_ADVICE", "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE",
937 "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS", "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS_LIE", "TALK_MISSION_FAILURE"
938 }
939 };
940 if( mission_topics.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
941 if( p->chatbin.mission_selected == nullptr ) {
942 return "mission_selected == nullptr; BUG! (npctalk.cpp:dynamic_line)";
943 }
944 mission *miss = p->chatbin.mission_selected;
945 const auto &type = miss->get_type();
946 // TODO: make it a member of the mission class, maybe at mission instance specific data
947 const std::string &ret = miss->dialogue_for_topic( topic );
948 if( ret.empty() ) {
949 debugmsg( "Bug in npctalk.cpp:dynamic_line. Wrong mission_id(%s) or topic(%s)",
950 type.id.c_str(), topic.c_str() );
951 return "";
952 }
953
954 if( topic == "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS" && miss->has_follow_up() ) {
955 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
956 case 1:
957 return ret + _( " And I have more I'd like you to do." );
958 case 2:
959 return ret + _( " I could use a hand with something else if you are interested." );
960 case 3:
961 return ret + _( " If you are interested, I have another job for you." );
962 }
963 }
964
965 return ret;
966 }
967
968 if( topic == "TALK_NONE" || topic == "TALK_DONE" ) {
969 return _( "Bye." );
970 } else if( topic == "TALK_TRAIN" ) {
971 if( !g->u.backlog.empty() && g->u.backlog.front().id() == ACT_TRAIN ) {
972 return _( "Shall we resume?" );
973 }
974 std::vector<skill_id> trainable = p->skills_offered_to( g->u );
975 std::vector<matype_id> styles = p->styles_offered_to( g->u );
976 const std::vector<spell_id> spells = p->magic->spells();
977 std::vector<spell_id> teachable_spells;
978 for( const spell_id &sp : spells ) {
979 if( g->u.magic->can_learn_spell( g->u, sp ) ) {
980 teachable_spells.emplace_back( sp );
981 }
982 }
983 if( trainable.empty() && styles.empty() && teachable_spells.empty() ) {
984 return _( "Sorry, but it doesn't seem I have anything to teach you." );
985 } else {
986 return _( "Here's what I can teach you…" );
987 }
988 } else if( topic == "TALK_HOW_MUCH_FURTHER" ) {
989 // TODO: this ignores the z-component
990 const tripoint_abs_omt player_pos = p->global_omt_location();
991 int dist = rl_dist( player_pos, p->goal );
992 std::string response;
993 dist *= 100;
994 if( dist >= 1300 ) {
995 int miles = dist / 25; // *100, e.g. quarter mile is "25"
996 miles -= miles % 25; // Round to nearest quarter-mile
997 int fullmiles = ( miles - miles % 100 ) / 100; // Left of the decimal point
998 if( fullmiles <= 0 ) {
999 fullmiles = 0;
1000 }
1001 response = string_format( _( "%d.%d miles." ), fullmiles, miles );
1002 } else {
1003 response = string_format( vgettext( "%d foot.", "%d feet.", dist ), dist );
1004 }
1005 return response;
1006 } else if( topic == "TALK_DESCRIBE_MISSION" ) {
1007 switch( p->mission ) {
1008 case NPC_MISSION_SHELTER:
1009 return string_format( _( "I'm holing up here for safety. Long term, %s" ),
1010 p->myclass.obj().get_job_description() );
1011 case NPC_MISSION_SHOPKEEP:
1012 return _( "I run the shop here." );
1013 case NPC_MISSION_GUARD:
1014 case NPC_MISSION_GUARD_ALLY:
1015 case NPC_MISSION_GUARD_PATROL:
1016 return string_format( _( "Currently, I'm guarding this location. Overall, %s" ),
1017 p->myclass.obj().get_job_description() );
1018 case NPC_MISSION_ACTIVITY:
1019 return string_format( _( "Right now, I'm <current_activity>. In general, %s" ),
1020 p->myclass.obj().get_job_description() );
1021 case NPC_MISSION_TRAVELLING:
1022 case NPC_MISSION_NULL:
1023 return p->myclass.obj().get_job_description();
1024 default:
1025 return string_format( "ERROR: Someone forgot to code an npc_mission text for "
1026 "mission: %d.", static_cast<int>( p->mission ) );
1027 } // switch (p->mission)
1028 } else if( topic == "TALK_SHOUT" ) {
1029 alpha->shout();
1030 if( alpha->is_deaf() ) {
1031 return _( "&You yell, but can't hear yourself." );
1032 } else {
1033 return _( "&You yell." );
1034 }
1035 } else if( topic == "TALK_SIZE_UP" ) {
1036 ///\EFFECT_PER affects whether player can size up NPCs
1037
1038 ///\EFFECT_INT slightly affects whether player can size up NPCs
1039 int ability = g->u.per_cur * 3 + g->u.int_cur;
1040 if( ability <= 10 ) {
1041 return _( "&You can't make anything out." );
1042 }
1043
1044 if( p->is_player_ally() || ability > 100 ) {
1045 ability = 100;
1046 }
1047
1048 std::string info = "&";
1049 int str_range = static_cast<int>( 100 / ability );
1050 int str_min = static_cast<int>( p->str_max / str_range ) * str_range;
1051 info += string_format( _( "Str %d - %d" ), str_min, str_min + str_range );
1052
1053 if( ability >= 40 ) {
1054 int dex_range = static_cast<int>( 160 / ability );
1055 int dex_min = static_cast<int>( p->dex_max / dex_range ) * dex_range;
1056 info += string_format( _( " Dex %d - %d" ), dex_min, dex_min + dex_range );
1057 }
1058
1059 if( ability >= 50 ) {
1060 int int_range = static_cast<int>( 200 / ability );
1061 int int_min = static_cast<int>( p->int_max / int_range ) * int_range;
1062 info += string_format( _( " Int %d - %d" ), int_min, int_min + int_range );
1063 }
1064
1065 if( ability >= 60 ) {
1066 int per_range = static_cast<int>( 240 / ability );
1067 int per_min = static_cast<int>( p->per_max / per_range ) * per_range;
1068 info += string_format( _( " Per %d - %d" ), per_min, per_min + per_range );
1069 }
1070
1071 needs_rates rates = p->calc_needs_rates();
1072 if( ability >= 100 - ( p->get_fatigue() / 10 ) ) {
1073 std::string how_tired;
1074 if( p->get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::exhausted ) {
1075 how_tired = _( "Exhausted" );
1076 } else if( p->get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::dead_tired ) {
1077 how_tired = _( "Dead tired" );
1078 } else if( p->get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::tired ) {
1079 how_tired = _( "Tired" );
1080 } else {
1081 how_tired = _( "Not tired" );
1082 if( ability >= 100 ) {
1083 time_duration sleep_at = 5_minutes * ( fatigue_levels::tired - p->get_fatigue() ) /
1084 rates.fatigue;
1085 how_tired += _( ". Will need sleep in " ) + to_string_approx( sleep_at );
1086 }
1087 }
1088 info += "\n" + how_tired;
1089 }
1090 if( ability >= 100 ) {
1091 if( p->get_thirst() < thirst_levels::thirsty ) {
1092 time_duration thirst_at = 5_minutes * ( thirst_levels::thirsty - p->get_thirst() ) / rates.thirst;
1093 if( thirst_at > 1_hours ) {
1094 info += _( "\nWill need water in " ) + to_string_approx( thirst_at );
1095 }
1096 } else {
1097 info += _( "\nThirsty" );
1098 }
1099 if( p->max_stored_kcal() - p->get_stored_kcal() > 500 ) {
1100 time_duration hunger_at = 5_minutes
1101 * ( 500 - p->max_stored_kcal() + p->get_stored_kcal() )
1102 / p->bmr();
1103 if( hunger_at > 1_hours ) {
1104 info += _( "\nWill need food in " ) + to_string_approx( hunger_at );
1105 }
1106 } else {
1107 info += _( "\nHungry" );
1108 }
1109 }
1110 return info;
1111 } else if( topic == "TALK_LOOK_AT" ) {
1112 return "&" + p->short_description();
1113 } else if( topic == "TALK_OPINION" ) {
1114 return "&" + p->opinion_text();
1115 } else if( topic == "TALK_MIND_CONTROL" ) {
1116 bool not_following = g->get_follower_list().count( p->getID() ) == 0;
1117 p->companion_mission_role_id.clear();
1118 talk_function::follow( *p );
1119 if( not_following ) {
1120 return _( "YES, MASTER!" );
1121 }
1122 }
1123
1124 return string_format( "I don't know what to say for %s. (BUG (npctalk.cpp:dynamic_line))",
1125 topic );
1126}
1127
1128void dialogue::apply_speaker_effects( const talk_topic &the_topic )
1129{
1130 const auto &topic = the_topic.id;
1131 const auto iter = json_talk_topics.find( topic );
1132 if( iter == json_talk_topics.end() ) {
1133 return;
1134 }
1135 for( json_dynamic_line_effect &npc_effect : iter->second.get_speaker_effects() ) {
1136 if( npc_effect.test_condition( *this ) ) {
1137 npc_effect.apply( *this );
1138 }
1139 }
1140}
1141
1142talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1143 const bool first )
1144{
1145 talk_response result = talk_response();
1146 result.truetext = no_translation( text );
1147 result.truefalse_condition = []( const dialogue & ) {
1148 return true;
1149 };
1150 result.success.next_topic = talk_topic( r );
1151 if( first ) {
1152 responses.insert( responses.begin(), result );
1153 return responses.front();
1154 } else {
1155 responses.push_back( result );
1156 return responses.back();
1157 }
1158}
1159
1160talk_response &dialogue::add_response_done( const std::string &text )
1161{
1162 return add_response( text, "TALK_DONE" );
1163}
1164
1165talk_response &dialogue::add_response_none( const std::string &text )
1166{
1167 return add_response( text, "TALK_NONE" );
1168}
1169
1170talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1171 talkfunction_ptr effect_success, const bool first )
1172{
1173 talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1174 result.success.set_effect( effect_success );
1175 return result;
1176}
1177
1178talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1179 std::function<void( npc & )> effect_success,
1180 dialogue_consequence consequence, const bool first )
1181{
1182 talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1183 result.success.set_effect_consequence( effect_success, consequence );
1184 return result;
1185}
1186
1187talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1188 mission *miss, const bool first )
1189{
1190 if( miss == nullptr ) {
1191 debugmsg( "tried to select null mission" );
1192 }
1193 talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1194 result.mission_selected = miss;
1195 return result;
1196}

1233
1234void dialogue::gen_responses( const talk_topic &the_topic )
1235{
1236 const auto &topic = the_topic.id; // for compatibility, later replace it in the code below
1237 const auto p = beta; // for compatibility, later replace it in the code below
1238 auto &ret = responses; // for compatibility, later replace it in the code below
1239 ret.clear();
1240 const auto iter = json_talk_topics.find( topic );
1241 if( iter != json_talk_topics.end() ) {
1242 json_talk_topic &jtt = iter->second;
1243 if( jtt.gen_responses( *this ) ) {
1244 return;
1245 }
1246 }
1247
1248 if( topic == "TALK_MISSION_LIST" ) {
1249 if( p->chatbin.missions.size() == 1 ) {
1250 add_response( _( "Tell me about it." ), "TALK_MISSION_OFFER",
1251 p->chatbin.missions.front(), true );
1252 } else {
1253 for( auto &mission : p->chatbin.missions ) {
1254 add_response( mission->get_type().tname(), "TALK_MISSION_OFFER", mission, true );
1255 }
1256 }
1257 } else if( topic == "TALK_MISSION_LIST_ASSIGNED" ) {
1258 if( missions_assigned.size() == 1 ) {
1259 add_response( _( "I have news." ), "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE", missions_assigned.front() );
1260 } else {
1261 for( auto &miss_it : missions_assigned ) {
1262 add_response( miss_it->get_type().tname(), "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE", miss_it );
1263 }
1264 }
1265 } else if( topic == "TALK_TRAIN" ) {
1266 if( !g->u.backlog.empty() && g->u.backlog.front().id() == ACT_TRAIN &&
1267 g->u.backlog.front().index == p->getID().get_value() ) {
1268 player_activity &backlog = g->u.backlog.front();
1269 const skill_id skillt( backlog.name );
1270 // TODO: This is potentially dangerous. A skill and a martial art
1271 // could have the same ident!
1272 if( !skillt.is_valid() ) {
1273 const matype_id styleid = matype_id( backlog.name );
1274 if( !styleid.is_valid() ) {
1275 const spell_id &sp_id = spell_id( backlog.name );
1276 if( p->magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
1277 add_response( string_format( _( "Yes, let's resume training %s" ), sp_id->name ),
1278 "TALK_TRAIN_START", sp_id );
1279 }
1280 } else {
1281 const martialart &style = styleid.obj();
1282 add_response( string_format( _( "Yes, let's resume training %s" ), style.name ), "TALK_TRAIN_START",
1283 style );
1284 }
1285 } else {
1286 add_response( string_format( _( "Yes, let's resume training %s" ), skillt->name() ),
1287 "TALK_TRAIN_START", skillt );
1288 }
1289 }
1290 std::vector<matype_id> styles = p->styles_offered_to( g->u );
1291 std::vector<skill_id> trainable = p->skills_offered_to( g->u );
1292 const std::vector<spell_id> spells = p->magic->spells();
1293 std::vector<spell_id> teachable_spells;
1294 for( const spell_id &sp : spells ) {
1295 const spell &temp_spell = p->magic->get_spell( sp );
1296 if( g->u.magic->can_learn_spell( g->u, sp ) ) {
1297 if( g->u.magic->knows_spell( sp ) ) {
1298 const spell &player_spell = g->u.magic->get_spell( sp );
1299 if( player_spell.is_max_level() || player_spell.get_level() >= temp_spell.get_level() ) {
1300 continue;
1301 }
1302 }
1303 teachable_spells.emplace_back( sp );
1304 }
1305 }
1306 if( trainable.empty() && styles.empty() && teachable_spells.empty() ) {
1307 add_response_none( _( "Oh, okay." ) );
1308 return;
1309 }
1310 for( const spell_id &sp : teachable_spells ) {
1311 const spell &temp_spell = p->magic->get_spell( sp );
1312 const bool knows = g->u.magic->knows_spell( sp );
1313 const int cost = p->calc_spell_training_cost( knows, temp_spell.get_difficulty(),
1314 temp_spell.get_level() );
1315 std::string text;
1316 if( knows ) {
1317 text = string_format( _( "%s: 1 hour lesson (cost %s)" ), temp_spell.name(),
1318 format_money( cost ) );
1319 } else {
1320 text = string_format( _( "%s: teaching spell knowledge (cost %s)" ), temp_spell.name(),
1321 format_money( cost ) );
1322 }
1323 add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_START", sp );
1324 }
1325 for( auto &style_id : styles ) {
1326 auto &style = style_id.obj();
1327 const int cost = calc_ma_style_training_cost( *p, style.id );
1328 //~Martial art style (cost in dollars)
1329 const std::string text = string_format( cost > 0 ? _( "%s ( cost $%d )" ) : "%s",
1330 style.name, cost / 100 );
1331 add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_START", style );
1332 }
1333 for( auto &trained : trainable ) {
1334 const int cost = calc_skill_training_cost( *p, trained );
1335 SkillLevel skill_level_obj = g->u.get_skill_level_object( trained );
1336 const int cur_level = skill_level_obj.level();
1337 const int cur_level_exercise = skill_level_obj.exercise();
1338 skill_level_obj.train( 100, true );
1339 const int next_level = skill_level_obj.level();
1340 const int next_level_exercise = skill_level_obj.exercise();
1341
1342 //~Skill name: current level (exercise) -> next level (exercise) (cost in dollars)
1343 std::string text = string_format( cost > 0 ? _( "%s: %d (%d%%) -> %d (%d%%) (cost $%d)" ) :
1344 _( "%s: %d (%d%%) -> %d (%d%%)" ),
1345 trained.obj().name(), cur_level, cur_level_exercise,
1346 next_level, next_level_exercise, cost / 100 );
1347 add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_START", trained );
1348 }
1349 add_response_none( _( "Eh, never mind." ) );
1350 } else if( topic == "TALK_HOW_MUCH_FURTHER" ) {
1351 add_response_none( _( "Okay, thanks." ) );
1352 add_response_done( _( "Let's keep moving." ) );
1353 }
1354
1355 if( g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL ) && !p->is_player_ally() ) {
1356 add_response( _( "OBEY ME!" ), "TALK_MIND_CONTROL" );
1357 add_response_done( _( "Bye." ) );
1358 }
1359
1360 if( ret.empty() ) {
1361 add_response_done( _( "Bye." ) );
1362 }
1363}
1364
1365static int parse_mod( const dialogue &d, const std::string &attribute, const int factor )
1366{
1367 player &u = *d.alpha;
1368 npc &p = *d.beta;
1369 int modifier = 0;
1370 if( attribute == "ANGER" ) {
1371 modifier = p.op_of_u.anger;
1372 } else if( attribute == "FEAR" ) {
1373 modifier = p.op_of_u.fear;
1374 } else if( attribute == "TRUST" ) {
1375 modifier = p.op_of_u.trust;
1376 } else if( attribute == "VALUE" ) {
1377 modifier = p.op_of_u.value;
1378 } else if( attribute == "POS_FEAR" ) {
1379 modifier = std::max( 0, p.op_of_u.fear );
1380 } else if( attribute == "AGGRESSION" ) {
1381 modifier = p.personality.aggression;
1382 } else if( attribute == "ALTRUISM" ) {
1383 modifier = p.personality.altruism;
1384 } else if( attribute == "BRAVERY" ) {
1385 modifier = p.personality.bravery;
1386 } else if( attribute == "COLLECTOR" ) {
1387 modifier = p.personality.collector;
1388 } else if( attribute == "MISSIONS" ) {
1389 modifier = p.assigned_missions_value() / OWED_VAL;
1390 } else if( attribute == "U_INTIMIDATE" ) {
1391 modifier = u.intimidation();
1392 } else if( attribute == "NPC_INTIMIDATE" ) {
1393 modifier = p.intimidation();
1394 }
1395 modifier *= factor;
1396 return modifier;
1397}
1398
1399int talk_trial::calc_chance( const dialogue &d ) const
1400{
1401 player &u = *d.alpha;
1402 if( u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL ) ) {
1403 return 100;
1404 }
1405 const social_modifiers &u_mods = u.get_mutation_social_mods();
1406
1407 npc &p = *d.beta;
1408 int chance = difficulty;
1409 switch( type ) {
1410 case NUM_TALK_TRIALS:
1411 debugmsg( "Called calc_chance with invalid talk_trial value %d", type );
1412 break;
1413 case TALK_TRIAL_LIE:
1414 chance += u.talk_skill() - p.talk_skill() + p.op_of_u.trust * 3;
1415 chance += u_mods.lie;
1416
1417 //come on, who would suspect a robot of lying?
1418 if( u.has_bionic( bio_voice ) ) {
1419 chance += 10;
1420 }
1421 if( u.has_bionic( bio_face_mask ) ) {
1422 chance += 20;
1423 }
1424 break;
1425 case TALK_TRIAL_PERSUADE:
1426 chance += u.talk_skill() - static_cast<int>( p.talk_skill() / 2 ) +
1427 p.op_of_u.trust * 2 + p.op_of_u.value;
1428 chance += u_mods.persuade;
1429
1430 if( u.has_bionic( bio_face_mask ) ) {
1431 chance += 10;
1432 }
1433 if( u.has_bionic( bio_deformity ) ) {
1434 chance -= 50;
1435 }
1436 if( u.has_bionic( bio_voice ) ) {
1437 chance -= 20;
1438 }
1439 break;
1440 case TALK_TRIAL_INTIMIDATE:
1441 chance += u.intimidation() - p.intimidation() + p.op_of_u.fear * 2 -
1442 p.personality.bravery * 2;
1443 chance += u_mods.intimidate;
1444
1445 if( u.has_bionic( bio_face_mask ) ) {
1446 chance += 10;
1447 }
1448 if( u.has_bionic( bio_armor_eyes ) ) {
1449 chance += 10;
1450 }
1451 if( u.has_bionic( bio_deformity ) ) {
1452 chance += 20;
1453 }
1454 if( u.has_bionic( bio_voice ) ) {
1455 chance += 20;
1456 }
1457 break;
1458 case TALK_TRIAL_NONE:
1459 chance = 100;
1460 break;
1461 case TALK_TRIAL_CONDITION:
1462 chance = condition( d ) ? 100 : 0;
1463 break;
1464 }
1465 for( const auto &this_mod : modifiers ) {
1466 chance += parse_mod( d, this_mod.first, this_mod.second );
1467 }
1468
1469 return std::max( 0, std::min( 100, chance ) );
1470}
1471
1472bool talk_trial::roll( dialogue &d ) const
1473{
1474 player &u = *d.alpha;
1475 if( type == TALK_TRIAL_NONE || u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL ) ) {
1476 return true;
1477 }
1478 const int chance = calc_chance( d );
1479 const bool success = rng( 0, 99 ) < chance;
1480 if( success ) {
1481 u.practice( skill_speech, ( 100 - chance ) / 10 );
1482 } else {
1483 u.practice( skill_speech, ( 100 - chance ) / 7 );
1484 }
1485 return success;
1486}

1488int topic_category( const talk_topic &the_topic )
1489{
1490 const auto &topic = the_topic.id;
1491 // TODO: ideally, this would be a property of the topic itself.
1492 // How this works: each category has a set of topics that belong to it, each set is checked
1493 // for the given topic and if a set contains, the category number is returned.
1494 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_1 = { {
1495 "TALK_MISSION_START", "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE", "TALK_MISSION_OFFER",
1496 "TALK_MISSION_ACCEPTED", "TALK_MISSION_REJECTED", "TALK_MISSION_ADVICE",
1497 "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE", "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS", "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS_LIE",
1498 "TALK_MISSION_FAILURE", "TALK_MISSION_REWARD", "TALK_MISSION_END",
1499 "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE_URGENT"
1500 }
1501 };
1502 if( topic_1.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1503 return 1;
1504 }
1505 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_2 = { {
1506 "TALK_SHARE_EQUIPMENT", "TALK_GIVE_EQUIPMENT", "TALK_DENY_EQUIPMENT"
1507 }
1508 };
1509 if( topic_2.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1510 return 2;
1511 }
1512 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_3 = { {
1513 "TALK_SUGGEST_FOLLOW", "TALK_AGREE_FOLLOW", "TALK_DENY_FOLLOW",
1514 }
1515 };
1516 if( topic_3.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1517 return 3;
1518 }
1519 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_4 = { {
1520 "TALK_COMBAT_ENGAGEMENT",
1521 }
1522 };
1523 if( topic_4.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1524 return 4;
1525 }
1526 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_5 = { {
1527 "TALK_COMBAT_COMMANDS",
1528 }
1529 };
1530 if( topic_5.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1531 return 5;
1532 }
1533 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_6 = { {
1534 "TALK_TRAIN", "TALK_TRAIN_START", "TALK_TRAIN_FORCE"
1535 }
1536 };
1537 if( topic_6.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1538 return 6;
1539 }
1540 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_7 = { {
1541 "TALK_MISC_RULES",
1542 }
1543 };
1544 if( topic_7.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1545 return 7;
1546 }
1547 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_8 = { {
1548 "TALK_AIM_RULES",
1549 }
1550 };
1551 if( topic_8.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1552 return 8;
1553 }
1554 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_9 = { {
1555 "TALK_FRIEND", "TALK_GIVE_ITEM", "TALK_USE_ITEM",
1556 }
1557 };
1558 if( topic_9.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1559 return 9;
1560 }
1561 static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_99 = { {
1562 "TALK_SIZE_UP", "TALK_LOOK_AT", "TALK_OPINION", "TALK_SHOUT"
1563 }
1564 };
1565 if( topic_99.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1566 return 99;
1567 }
1568 return -1; // Not grouped with other topics
1569}
1570
1571void parse_tags( std::string &phrase, const Character &u, const Character &me,
1572 const itype_id &item_type )
1573{
1574 phrase = SNIPPET.expand( remove_color_tags( phrase ) );
1575
1576 size_t fa;
1577 size_t fb;
1578 std::string tag;
1579 do {
1580 fa = phrase.find( '<' );
1581 fb = phrase.find( '>' );
1582 int l = fb - fa + 1;
1583 if( fa != std::string::npos && fb != std::string::npos ) {
1584 tag = phrase.substr( fa, fb - fa + 1 );
1585 } else {
1586 return;
1587 }
1588
1589 // Special, dynamic tags go here
1590 if( tag == "<yrwp>" ) {
1591 phrase.replace( fa, l, remove_color_tags( u.weapon.tname() ) );
1592 } else if( tag == "<mywp>" ) {
1593 if( !me.is_armed() ) {
1594 phrase.replace( fa, l, _( "fists" ) );
1595 } else {
1596 phrase.replace( fa, l, remove_color_tags( me.weapon.tname() ) );
1597 }
1598 } else if( tag == "<ammo>" ) {
1599 if( !me.weapon.is_gun() ) {
1600 phrase.replace( fa, l, _( "BADAMMO" ) );
1601 } else {
1602 phrase.replace( fa, l, me.weapon.ammo_current()->nname( 1 ) );
1603 }
1604 } else if( tag == "<current_activity>" ) {
1605 std::string activity_name;
1606 const npc *guy = dynamic_cast<const npc *>( &me );
1607 if( guy->current_activity_id ) {
1608 activity_name = guy->current_activity_id.obj().verb().translated();
1609 } else {
1610 activity_name = _( "doing this and that" );
1611 }
1612 phrase.replace( fa, l, activity_name );
1613 } else if( tag == "<punc>" ) {
1614 switch( rng( 0, 2 ) ) {
1615 case 0:
1616 phrase.replace( fa, l, pgettext( "punctuation", "." ) );
1617 break;
1618 case 1:
1619 phrase.replace( fa, l, pgettext( "punctuation", "…" ) );
1620 break;
1621 case 2:
1622 phrase.replace( fa, l, pgettext( "punctuation", "!" ) );
1623 break;
1624 }
1625 } else if( tag == "<mypronoun>" ) {
1626 std::string npcstr = me.male ? pgettext( "npc", "He" ) : pgettext( "npc", "She" );
1627 phrase.replace( fa, l, npcstr );
1628 } else if( tag == "<topic_item>" ) {
1629 phrase.replace( fa, l, item::nname( item_type, 2 ) );
1630 } else if( tag == "<topic_item_price>" ) {
1631 item tmp( item_type );
1632 phrase.replace( fa, l, format_money( tmp.price( true ) ) );
1633 } else if( tag == "<topic_item_my_total_price>" ) {
1634 item tmp( item_type );
1635 tmp.charges = me.charges_of( item_type );
1636 phrase.replace( fa, l, format_money( tmp.price( true ) ) );
1637 } else if( tag == "<topic_item_your_total_price>" ) {
1638 item tmp( item_type );
1639 tmp.charges = u.charges_of( item_type );
1640 phrase.replace( fa, l, format_money( tmp.price( true ) ) );
1641 } else if( !tag.empty() ) {
1642 debugmsg( "Bad tag. '%s' (%d - %d)", tag.c_str(), fa, fb );
1643 phrase.replace( fa, fb - fa + 1, "????" );
1644 }
1645 } while( fa != std::string::npos && fb != std::string::npos );
1646}
1647
1648void dialogue::add_topic( const std::string &topic_id )
1649{
1650 topic_stack.push_back( talk_topic( topic_id ) );
1651}
1652
1653void dialogue::add_topic( const talk_topic &topic )
1654{
1655 topic_stack.push_back( topic );
1656}
1657
1658talk_data talk_response::create_option_line( const dialogue &d, const char letter )
1659{
1660 std::string ftext;
1661 text = ( truefalse_condition( d ) ? truetext : falsetext ).translated();
1662 // dialogue w/ a % chance to work
1663 if( trial.type == TALK_TRIAL_NONE || trial.type == TALK_TRIAL_CONDITION ) {
1664 // regular dialogue
1665 //~ %1$s is translated response text
1666 ftext = string_format( pgettext( "talk option", "%1$s" ), text );
1667 } else {
1668 // dialogue w/ a % chance to work
1669 //~ %1$s is translated trial type, %2$d is a number, and %3$s is the translated response text
1670 ftext = string_format( pgettext( "talk option", "[%1$s %2$d%%] %3$s" ), trial.name(),
1671 trial.calc_chance( d ), text );
1672 }
1673 parse_tags( ftext, *d.alpha, *d.beta, success.next_topic.item_type );
1674
1675 nc_color color;
1676 std::set<dialogue_consequence> consequences = get_consequences( d );
1677 if( consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::hostile ) > 0 ) {
1678 color = c_red;
1679 } else if( text[0] == '*' || consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::helpless ) > 0 ) {
1680 color = c_light_red;
1681 } else if( text[0] == '&' || consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::action ) > 0 ) {
1682 color = c_green;
1683 } else {
1684 color = c_white;
1685 }
1686 return {letter, color, ftext};
1687}
1688
1689std::set<dialogue_consequence> talk_response::get_consequences( const dialogue &d ) const
1690{
1691 int chance = trial.calc_chance( d );
1692 if( chance >= 100 ) {
1693 return { success.get_consequence( d ) };
1694 } else if( chance <= 0 ) {
1695 return { failure.get_consequence( d ) };
1696 }
1697
1698 return {{ success.get_consequence( d ), failure.get_consequence( d ) }};
1699}
1700
1701dialogue_consequence talk_effect_t::get_consequence( const dialogue &d ) const
1702{
1703 if( d.beta->op_of_u.anger + opinion.anger >= d.beta->hostile_anger_level() ) {
1704 return dialogue_consequence::hostile;
1705 }
1706 return guaranteed_consequence;
1707}
1708
1709const talk_topic &special_talk( char ch )
1710{
1711 static const std::map<char, talk_topic> key_map = {{
1712 { 'L', talk_topic( "TALK_LOOK_AT" ) },
1713 { 'S', talk_topic( "TALK_SIZE_UP" ) },
1714 { 'O', talk_topic( "TALK_OPINION" ) },
1715 { 'Y', talk_topic( "TALK_SHOUT" ) },
1716 }
1717 };
1718
1719 const auto iter = key_map.find( ch );
1720 if( iter != key_map.end() ) {
1721 return iter->second;
1722 }
1723
1724 static const talk_topic no_topic = talk_topic( "TALK_NONE" );
1725 return no_topic;
1726}
1727
1728talk_topic dialogue::opt( dialogue_window &d_win, const std::string &npc_name,
1729 const talk_topic &topic )
1730{
1731 std::string challenge = dynamic_line( topic );
1732 gen_responses( topic );
1733 // Put quotes around challenge (unless it's an action)
1734 if( challenge[0] != '*' && challenge[0] != '&' ) {
1735 challenge = "\"" + challenge + "\"";
1736 }
1737
1738 // Parse any tags in challenge
1739 parse_tags( challenge, *alpha, *beta, topic.item_type );
1740 capitalize_letter( challenge );
1741
1742 // Prepend "My Name: "
1743 if( challenge[0] == '&' ) {
1744 // No name prepended!
1745 challenge = challenge.substr( 1 );
1746 } else if( challenge[0] == '*' ) {
1747 challenge = string_format( pgettext( "npc does something", "%s %s" ), beta->name,
1748 challenge.substr( 1 ) );
1749 } else {
1750 challenge = string_format( pgettext( "npc says something", "%s: %s" ), beta->name,
1751 challenge );
1752 }
1753
1754 d_win.add_to_history( challenge );
1755
1756 apply_speaker_effects( topic );
1757
1758 std::vector<talk_data> response_lines;
1759 for( size_t i = 0; i < responses.size(); i++ ) {
1760 response_lines.push_back( responses[i].create_option_line( *this, 'a' + i ) );
1761 }
1762
1763#if defined(__ANDROID__)
1764 input_context ctxt( "DIALOGUE_CHOOSE_RESPONSE" );
1765 for( size_t i = 0; i < responses.size(); i++ ) {
1766 ctxt.register_manual_key( 'a' + i );
1767 }
1768 ctxt.register_manual_key( 'L', "Look at" );
1769 ctxt.register_manual_key( 'S', "Size up stats" );
1770 ctxt.register_manual_key( 'Y', "Yell" );
1771 ctxt.register_manual_key( 'O', "Check opinion" );
1772#endif
1773
1774 ui_adaptor ui;
1775 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1776 d_win.resize_dialogue( ui );
1777 } );
1778 ui.mark_resize();
1779
1780 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
1781 d_win.print_header( npc_name );
1782 d_win.display_responses( response_lines );
1783 } );
1784
1785 int ch;
1786 bool okay;
1787 do {
1788 d_win.refresh_response_display();
1789 do {
1790 ui_manager::redraw();
1791 ch = inp_mngr.get_input_event().get_first_input();
1792 d_win.handle_scrolling( ch );
1793 auto st = special_talk( ch );
1794 if( st.id != "TALK_NONE" ) {
1795 return st;
1796 }
1797 switch( ch ) {
1798 case KEY_DOWN:
1799 case KEY_NPAGE:
1800 case KEY_UP:
1801 case KEY_PPAGE:
1802 ch = -1;
1803 break;
1804 default:
1805 ch -= 'a';
1806 break;
1807 }
1808 } while( ( ch < 0 || ch >= static_cast<int>( responses.size() ) ) );
1809 okay = true;
1810 std::set<dialogue_consequence> consequences = responses[ch].get_consequences( *this );
1811 if( consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::hostile ) > 0 ) {
1812 okay = query_yn( _( "You may be attacked! Proceed?" ) );
1813 } else if( consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::helpless ) > 0 ) {
1814 okay = query_yn( _( "You'll be helpless! Proceed?" ) );
1815 }
1816 } while( !okay );
1817
1818 talk_response chosen = responses[ch];
1819 std::string response_printed = string_format( pgettext( "you say something", "You: %s" ),
1820 response_lines[ch].text );
1821 d_win.add_to_history( response_printed );
1822
1823 if( chosen.mission_selected != nullptr ) {
1824 beta->chatbin.mission_selected = chosen.mission_selected;
1825 }
1826
1827 // We can't set both skill and style or training will bug out
1828 // TODO: Allow setting both skill and style
1829 if( chosen.skill ) {
1830 beta->chatbin.skill = chosen.skill;
1831 beta->chatbin.style = matype_id::NULL_ID();
1832 beta->chatbin.dialogue_spell = spell_id();
1833 } else if( chosen.style ) {
1834 beta->chatbin.style = chosen.style;
1835 beta->chatbin.skill = skill_id::NULL_ID();
1836 beta->chatbin.dialogue_spell = spell_id();
1837 } else if( chosen.dialogue_spell != spell_id() ) {
1838 beta->chatbin.style = matype_id::NULL_ID();
1839 beta->chatbin.skill = skill_id::NULL_ID();
1840 beta->chatbin.dialogue_spell = chosen.dialogue_spell;
1841 }
1842 const bool success = chosen.trial.roll( *this );
1843 const auto &effects = success ? chosen.success : chosen.failure;
1844 return effects.apply( *this );
1845}
1846
1847talk_trial::talk_trial( const JsonObject &jo )
1848{
1849 static const std::unordered_map<std::string, talk_trial_type> types_map = { {
1850#define WRAP(value) { #value, TALK_TRIAL_##value }
1851 WRAP( NONE ),
1852 WRAP( LIE ),
1853 WRAP( PERSUADE ),
1854 WRAP( INTIMIDATE ),
1855 WRAP( CONDITION )
1856#undef WRAP
1857 }
1858 };
1859 const auto iter = types_map.find( jo.get_string( "type", "NONE" ) );
1860 if( iter == types_map.end() ) {
1861 jo.throw_error( "invalid talk trial type", "type" );
1862 }
1863 type = iter->second;
1864 if( !( type == TALK_TRIAL_NONE || type == TALK_TRIAL_CONDITION ) ) {
1865 difficulty = jo.get_int( "difficulty" );
1866 }
1867
1868 read_condition<dialogue>( jo, "condition", condition, false );
1869
1870 if( jo.has_member( "mod" ) ) {
1871 for( JsonArray jmod : jo.get_array( "mod" ) ) {
1872 trial_mod this_modifier;
1873 this_modifier.first = jmod.next_string();
1874 this_modifier.second = jmod.next_int();
1875 modifiers.push_back( this_modifier );
1876 }
1877 }
1878}
1879
1880static talk_topic load_inline_topic( const JsonObject &jo )
1881{
1882 const std::string id = jo.get_string( "id" );
1883 json_talk_topics[id].load( jo );
1884 return talk_topic( id );
1885}

1919// TODO: Remove after effect permanence change
1920#include "effect.h"
1921void talk_effect_fun_t::set_add_effect( const JsonObject &jo, const std::string &member,
1922 bool is_npc )
1923{
1924 efftype_id new_effect( jo.get_string( member ) );
1925 time_duration duration = 1_turns;
1926 bool permanent = false;
1927 if( jo.has_string( "duration" ) ) {
1928 const std::string dur_string = jo.get_string( "duration" );
1929 if( dur_string == "PERMANENT" ) {
1930 permanent = true;
1931 if( json_report_strict ) {
1932 // This is immensely ugly, we need json.just_warn_with_context
1933 try {
1934 jo.throw_error( "Effect permanence has been moved to effect_type. Set permanence there.",
1935 "duration" );
1936 } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
1937 debugmsg( "\n%s", e.what() );
1938 }
1939 }
1940 } else if( !dur_string.empty() && std::stoi( dur_string ) > 0 ) {
1941 duration = time_duration::from_turns( std::stoi( dur_string ) );
1942 }
1943 } else {
1944 duration = time_duration::from_turns( jo.get_int( "duration", 1 ) );
1945 }
1946 function = [is_npc, new_effect, duration, permanent]( const dialogue & d ) {
1947 player *actor = d.alpha;
1948 if( is_npc ) {
1949 actor = dynamic_cast<player *>( d.beta );
1950 }
1951 actor->add_effect( new_effect, duration, num_bp );
1952 if( permanent ) {
1953 actor->get_effect( new_effect, num_bp ).set_permanent();
1954 }
1955 };
1956}

2044
2045void talk_effect_fun_t::set_u_buy_item( const itype_id &item_name, int cost, int count,
2046 const std::string &container_name )
2047{
2048 function = [item_name, cost, count, container_name]( const dialogue & d ) {
2049 npc &p = *d.beta;
2050 player &u = *d.alpha;
2051 if( !npc_trading::pay_npc( p, cost ) ) {
2052 popup( _( "You can't afford it!" ) );
2053 return;
2054 }
2055 if( container_name.empty() ) {
2056 item new_item = item( item_name, calendar::turn );
2057 if( new_item.count_by_charges() ) {
2058 new_item.mod_charges( count - 1 );
2059 u.i_add( new_item );
2060 } else {
2061 for( int i_cnt = 0; i_cnt < count; i_cnt++ ) {
2062 u.i_add( new_item );
2063 }
2064 }
2065 if( count == 1 ) {
2066 //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
2067 popup( _( "%1$s gives you a %2$s." ), p.name, new_item.tname() );
2068 } else {
2069 //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$d is a number of items, %3$s are items
2070 popup( _( "%1$s gives you %2$d %3$s." ), p.name, count, new_item.tname() );
2071 }
2072 } else {
2073 item container( container_name, calendar::turn );
2074 container.put_in( item( item_name, calendar::turn, count ) );
2075 u.i_add( container );
2076 //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
2077 popup( _( "%1$s gives you a %2$s." ), p.name, container.tname() );
2078 }
2079 };
2080
2081 // Update structure used by mission descriptions.
2082 if( cost <= 0 ) {
2083 likely_rewards.push_back( std::pair<int, itype_id>( count, item_name ) );
2084 }
2085}
2086
2087void talk_effect_fun_t::set_u_sell_item( const itype_id &item_name, int cost, int count )
2088{
2089 function = [item_name, cost, count]( const dialogue & d ) {
2090 npc &p = *d.beta;
2091 player &u = *d.alpha;
2092 if( item::count_by_charges( item_name ) && u.has_charges( item_name, count ) ) {
2093 for( const item &it : u.use_charges( item_name, count ) ) {
2094 p.i_add( it );
2095 }
2096 } else if( u.has_amount( item_name, count ) ) {
2097 for( const item &it : u.use_amount( item_name, count ) ) {
2098 p.i_add( it );
2099 }
2100 } else {
2101 //~ %1$s is a translated item name
2102 popup( _( "You don't have a %1$s!" ), item::nname( item_name ) );
2103 return;
2104 }
2105 if( count == 1 ) {
2106 //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
2107 popup( _( "You give %1$s a %2$s." ), p.name, item::nname( item_name ) );
2108 } else {
2109 //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$d is a number of items, %3$s are items
2110 popup( _( "You give %1$s %2$d %3$s." ), p.name, count, item::nname( item_name, count ) );
2111 }
2112 p.op_of_u.owed += cost;
2113 };
2114}

2116void talk_effect_fun_t::set_consume_item( const JsonObject &jo, const std::string &member,
2117 int count,
2118 bool is_npc )
2119{
2120 itype_id item_name;
2121 jo.read( member, item_name, true );
2122 function = [is_npc, item_name, count]( const dialogue & d ) {
2123 // this is stupid, but I couldn't get the assignment to work
2124 const auto consume_item = [&]( player & p, const itype_id & item_name, int count ) {
2125 item old_item( item_name );
2126 if( p.has_charges( item_name, count ) ) {
2127 p.use_charges( item_name, count );
2128 } else if( p.has_amount( item_name, count ) ) {
2129 p.use_amount( item_name, count );
2130 } else {
2131 //~ %1%s is the "You" or the NPC name, %2$s are a translated item name
2132 popup( _( "%1$s doesn't have a %2$s!" ), p.disp_name(), old_item.tname() );
2133 }
2134 };
2135 if( is_npc ) {
2136 consume_item( *d.beta, item_name, count );
2137 } else {
2138 consume_item( *d.alpha, item_name, count );
2139 }
2140 };

2286void talk_effect_fun_t::set_mapgen_update( const JsonObject &jo, const std::string &member )
2287{
2288 mission_target_params target_params = mission_util::parse_mission_om_target( jo );
2289 std::vector<std::string> update_ids;
2290
2291 if( jo.has_string( member ) ) {
2292 update_ids.emplace_back( jo.get_string( member ) );
2293 } else if( jo.has_array( member ) ) {
2294 for( const std::string line : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
2295 update_ids.emplace_back( line );
2296 }
2297 }
2298
2299 function = [target_params, update_ids]( const dialogue & d ) {
2300 mission_target_params update_params = target_params;
2301 update_params.guy = d.beta;
2302 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = mission_util::get_om_terrain_pos( update_params );
2303 for( const std::string &mapgen_update_id : update_ids ) {
2304 run_mapgen_update_func( mapgen_update_id, omt_pos, d.beta->chatbin.mission_selected );
2305 }
2306 };

2308
2309void talk_effect_fun_t::set_bulk_trade_accept( bool is_trade, bool is_npc )
2310{
2311 function = [is_trade, is_npc]( const dialogue & d ) {
2312 player *seller = d.alpha;
2313 player *buyer = dynamic_cast<player *>( d.beta );
2314 if( is_npc ) {
2315 seller = dynamic_cast<player *>( d.beta );
2316 buyer = d.alpha;
2317 }
2318 int seller_has = seller->charges_of( d.cur_item );
2319 item tmp( d.cur_item );
2320 tmp.charges = seller_has;
2321 if( is_trade ) {
2322 int price = tmp.price( true ) * ( is_npc ? -1 : 1 ) + d.beta->op_of_u.owed;
2323 if( d.beta->get_faction() && !d.beta->get_faction()->currency.is_empty() ) {
2324 const itype_id &pay_in = d.beta->get_faction()->currency;
2325 item pay( pay_in );
2326 if( d.beta->value( pay ) > 0 ) {
2327 int required = price / d.beta->value( pay );
2328 int buyer_has = required;
2329 if( is_npc ) {
2330 buyer_has = std::min( buyer_has, buyer->charges_of( pay_in ) );
2331 buyer->use_charges( pay_in, buyer_has );
2332 } else {
2333 if( buyer_has == 1 ) {
2334 //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
2335 popup( _( "%1$s gives you a %2$s." ), d.beta->disp_name(),
2336 pay.tname() );
2337 } else if( buyer_has > 1 ) {
2338 //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$d is a number of items, %3$s are items
2339 popup( _( "%1$s gives you %2$d %3$s." ), d.beta->disp_name(), buyer_has,
2340 pay.tname() );
2341 }
2342 }
2343 for( int i = 0; i < buyer_has; i++ ) {
2344 seller->i_add( pay );
2345 price -= d.beta->value( pay );
2346 }
2347 }
2348 d.beta->op_of_u.owed = price;
2349 }
2350 }
2351 seller->use_charges( d.cur_item, seller_has );
2352 buyer->i_add( tmp );
2353 };
2354}
