2363void talk_effect_fun_t::set_add_mission( const std::string &mission_id )
2364{
2365 function = [mission_id]( const dialogue & d ) {
2366 npc &p = *d.beta;
2367 mission *miss = mission::reserve_new( mission_type_id( mission_id ), p.getID() );
2368 miss->assign( g->u );
2369 p.chatbin.missions_assigned.push_back( miss );
2370 };
2371}
2372
2373const std::vector<std::pair<int, itype_id>> &talk_effect_fun_t::get_likely_rewards() const
2374{
2375 return likely_rewards;
2376}
2377
2378void talk_effect_fun_t::set_u_buy_monster( const std::string &monster_type_id, int cost, int count,
2379 bool pacified, const translation &name )
2380{
2381 function = [monster_type_id, cost, count, pacified, name]( const dialogue & d ) {
2382 npc &p = *d.beta;
2383 player &u = *d.alpha;
2384 if( !npc_trading::pay_npc( p, cost ) ) {
2385 popup( _( "You can't afford it!" ) );
2386 return;
2387 }
2388
2389 const mtype_id mtype( monster_type_id );
2390
2391 for( int i = 0; i < count; i++ ) {
2392 monster *const mon_ptr = g->place_critter_around( mtype, u.pos(), 3 );
2393 if( !mon_ptr ) {
2394 add_msg( m_debug, "Cannot place u_buy_monster, no valid placement locations." );
2395 break;
2396 }
2397 monster &tmp = *mon_ptr;
2398 // Our monster is always a pet.
2399 tmp.friendly = -1;
2400 tmp.add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, num_bp );
2401
2402 if( pacified ) {
2403 tmp.add_effect( effect_pacified, 1_turns, num_bp );
2404 }
2405
2406 if( !name.empty() ) {
2407 tmp.unique_name = name.translated();
2408 }
2409
2410 }
2411
2412 if( name.empty() ) {
2413 popup( _( "%1$s gives you %2$d %3$s." ), p.name, count, mtype.obj().nname( count ) );
2414 } else {
2415 popup( _( "%1$s gives you %2$s." ), p.name, name );
2416 }
2417 };
2418}
2419
2420void talk_effect_fun_t::set_u_learn_recipe( const std::string &learned_recipe_id )
2421{
2422 function = [learned_recipe_id]( const dialogue & d ) {
2423 const recipe &r = recipe_id( learned_recipe_id ).obj();
2424 d.alpha->learn_recipe( &r );
2425 popup( _( "You learn how to craft %s." ), r.result_name() );
2426 };
2427}
2428
2429void talk_effect_fun_t::set_npc_first_topic( const std::string &chat_topic )
2430{
2431 function = [chat_topic]( const dialogue & d ) {
2432 d.beta->chatbin.first_topic = chat_topic;
2433 };
2434}
2435
2436void talk_effect_t::set_effect_consequence( const talk_effect_fun_t &fun, dialogue_consequence con )
2437{
2438 effects.push_back( fun );
2439 guaranteed_consequence = std::max( guaranteed_consequence, con );
2440}
2441
2442void talk_effect_t::set_effect_consequence( std::function<void( npc &p )> ptr,
2443 dialogue_consequence con )
2444{
2445 talk_effect_fun_t npctalk_setter( ptr );
2446 set_effect_consequence( npctalk_setter, con );
2447}
2448
2449void talk_effect_t::set_effect( const talk_effect_fun_t &fun )
2450{
2451 effects.push_back( fun );
2452 guaranteed_consequence = std::max( guaranteed_consequence, dialogue_consequence::none );
2453}
2454
2455void talk_effect_t::set_effect( talkfunction_ptr ptr )
2456{
2457 talk_effect_fun_t npctalk_setter( ptr );
2458 dialogue_consequence response;
2459 if( ptr == &talk_function::hostile ) {
2460 response = dialogue_consequence::hostile;
2461 } else if( ptr == &talk_function::player_weapon_drop ||
2462 ptr == &talk_function::player_weapon_away ||
2463 ptr == &talk_function::start_mugging ) {
2464 response = dialogue_consequence::helpless;
2465 } else {
2466 response = dialogue_consequence::none;
2467 }
2468 set_effect_consequence( npctalk_setter, response );
2469}
2470
2471talk_topic talk_effect_t::apply( dialogue &d ) const
2472{
2473 // Need to get a reference to the mission before effects are applied, because effects can remove the mission
2474 mission *miss = d.beta->chatbin.mission_selected;
2475
2476 for( const talk_effect_fun_t &effect : effects ) {
2477 effect( d );
2478 }
2479 d.beta->op_of_u += opinion;
2480 if( miss && ( mission_opinion.trust || mission_opinion.fear ||
2481 mission_opinion.value || mission_opinion.anger ) ) {
2482 int m_value = npc_trading::cash_to_favor( *d.beta, miss->get_value() );
2483 npc_opinion mod = npc_opinion( mission_opinion.trust ?
2484 m_value / mission_opinion.trust : 0,
2485 mission_opinion.fear ?
2486 m_value / mission_opinion.fear : 0,
2487 mission_opinion.value ?
2488 m_value / mission_opinion.value : 0,
2489 mission_opinion.anger ?
2490 m_value / mission_opinion.anger : 0, 0 );
2491 d.beta->op_of_u += mod;
2492 }
2493 if( d.beta->turned_hostile() ) {
2494 d.beta->make_angry();
2495 return talk_topic( "TALK_DONE" );
2496 }
2497
2498 // TODO: this is a hack, it should be in clear_mission or so, but those functions have
2499 // no access to the dialogue object.
2500 auto &ma = d.missions_assigned;
2501 ma.clear();
2502 // Update the missions we can talk about (must only be current, non-complete ones)
2503 for( auto &mission : d.beta->chatbin.missions_assigned ) {
2504 if( mission->get_assigned_player_id() == d.alpha->getID() ) {
2505 ma.push_back( mission );
2506 }
2507 }
2508
2509 return next_topic;
2510}
2511
2512talk_effect_t::talk_effect_t( const JsonObject &jo )
2513{
2514 load_effect( jo );
2515 if( jo.has_object( "topic" ) ) {
2516 next_topic = load_inline_topic( jo.get_object( "topic" ) );
2517 } else if( jo.has_string( "topic" ) ) {
2518 next_topic = talk_topic( jo.get_string( "topic" ) );
2519 }
2520}
2521
2522void talk_effect_t::parse_sub_effect( const JsonObject &jo )
2523{
2524 talk_effect_fun_t subeffect_fun;
2525 const bool is_npc = true;
2526 if( jo.has_string( "companion_mission" ) ) {
2527 std::string role_id = jo.get_string( "companion_mission" );
2528 subeffect_fun.set_companion_mission( role_id );
2529 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_add_effect" ) ) {
2530 subeffect_fun.set_add_effect( jo, "u_add_effect" );
2531 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_add_effect" ) ) {
2532 subeffect_fun.set_add_effect( jo, "npc_add_effect", is_npc );
2533 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_lose_effect" ) ) {
2534 subeffect_fun.set_remove_effect( jo, "u_lose_effect" );
2535 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_lose_effect" ) ) {
2536 subeffect_fun.set_remove_effect( jo, "npc_lose_effect", is_npc );
2537 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_add_var" ) ) {
2538 subeffect_fun.set_add_var( jo, "u_add_var" );
2539 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_add_var" ) ) {
2540 subeffect_fun.set_add_var( jo, "npc_add_var", is_npc );
2541 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_lose_var" ) ) {
2542 subeffect_fun.set_remove_var( jo, "u_lose_var" );
2543 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_lose_var" ) ) {
2544 subeffect_fun.set_remove_var( jo, "npc_lose_var", is_npc );
2545 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_adjust_var" ) ) {
2546 subeffect_fun.set_adjust_var( jo, "u_adjust_var" );
2547 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_adjust_var" ) ) {
2548 subeffect_fun.set_adjust_var( jo, "npc_adjust_var", is_npc );
2549 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_add_trait" ) ) {
2550 subeffect_fun.set_add_trait( jo, "u_add_trait" );
2551 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_add_trait" ) ) {
2552 subeffect_fun.set_add_trait( jo, "npc_add_trait", is_npc );
2553 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_lose_trait" ) ) {
2554 subeffect_fun.set_remove_trait( jo, "u_lose_trait" );
2555 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_lose_trait" ) ) {
2556 subeffect_fun.set_remove_trait( jo, "npc_lose_trait", is_npc );
2557 } else if( jo.has_int( "u_spend_ecash" ) ) {
2558 int cash_change = jo.get_int( "u_spend_ecash" );
2559 subeffect_fun.set_u_spend_ecash( cash_change );
2560 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_sell_item" ) || jo.has_string( "u_buy_item" ) ||
2561 jo.has_string( "u_consume_item" ) || jo.has_string( "npc_consume_item" ) ||
2562 jo.has_string( "u_remove_item_with" ) || jo.has_string( "npc_remove_item_with" ) ) {
2563 int cost = 0;
2564 if( jo.has_int( "cost" ) ) {
2565 cost = jo.get_int( "cost" );
2566 }
2567 int count = 1;
2568 if( jo.has_int( "count" ) ) {
2569 count = jo.get_int( "count" );
2570 }
2571 std::string container_name;
2572 if( jo.has_string( "container" ) ) {
2573 container_name = jo.get_string( "container" );
2574 }
2575 if( jo.has_string( "u_sell_item" ) ) {
2576 itype_id item_name;
2577 jo.read( "u_sell_item", item_name, true );
2578 subeffect_fun.set_u_sell_item( item_name, cost, count );
2579 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_buy_item" ) ) {
2580 itype_id item_name;
2581 jo.read( "u_buy_item", item_name, true );
2582 subeffect_fun.set_u_buy_item( item_name, cost, count, container_name );
2583 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_consume_item" ) ) {
2584 subeffect_fun.set_consume_item( jo, "u_consume_item", count );
2585 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_consume_item" ) ) {
2586 subeffect_fun.set_consume_item( jo, "npc_consume_item", count, is_npc );
2587 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_remove_item_with" ) ) {
2588 subeffect_fun.set_remove_item_with( jo, "u_remove_item_with" );
2589 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_remove_item_with" ) ) {
2590 subeffect_fun.set_remove_item_with( jo, "npc_remove_item_with", is_npc );
2591 }
2592 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_change_class" ) ) {
2593 std::string class_name = jo.get_string( "npc_change_class" );
2594 subeffect_fun.set_npc_change_class( class_name );
2595 } else if( jo.has_string( "add_mission" ) ) {
2596 std::string mission_id = jo.get_string( "add_mission" );
2597 subeffect_fun.set_add_mission( mission_id );
2598 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_change_faction" ) ) {
2599 std::string faction_name = jo.get_string( "npc_change_faction" );
2600 subeffect_fun.set_npc_change_faction( faction_name );
2601 } else if( jo.has_int( "u_faction_rep" ) ) {
2602 int faction_rep = jo.get_int( "u_faction_rep" );
2603 subeffect_fun.set_change_faction_rep( faction_rep );
2604 } else if( jo.has_array( "add_debt" ) ) {
2605 std::vector<trial_mod> debt_modifiers;
2606 for( JsonArray jmod : jo.get_array( "add_debt" ) ) {
2607 trial_mod this_modifier;
2608 this_modifier.first = jmod.next_string();
2609 this_modifier.second = jmod.next_int();
2610 debt_modifiers.push_back( this_modifier );
2611 }
2612 subeffect_fun.set_add_debt( debt_modifiers );
2613 } else if( jo.has_string( "toggle_npc_rule" ) ) {
2614 const std::string rule = jo.get_string( "toggle_npc_rule" );
2615 subeffect_fun.set_toggle_npc_rule( rule );
2616 } else if( jo.has_string( "set_npc_rule" ) ) {
2617 const std::string rule = jo.get_string( "set_npc_rule" );
2618 subeffect_fun.set_set_npc_rule( rule );
2619 } else if( jo.has_string( "clear_npc_rule" ) ) {
2620 const std::string rule = jo.get_string( "clear_npc_rule" );
2621 subeffect_fun.set_clear_npc_rule( rule );
2622 } else if( jo.has_string( "set_npc_engagement_rule" ) ) {
2623 const std::string setting = jo.get_string( "set_npc_engagement_rule" );
2624 subeffect_fun.set_npc_engagement_rule( setting );
2625 } else if( jo.has_string( "set_npc_aim_rule" ) ) {
2626 const std::string setting = jo.get_string( "set_npc_aim_rule" );
2627 subeffect_fun.set_npc_aim_rule( setting );
2628 } else if( jo.has_string( "set_npc_cbm_reserve_rule" ) ) {
2629 const std::string setting = jo.get_string( "set_npc_cbm_reserve_rule" );
2630 subeffect_fun.set_npc_cbm_reserve_rule( setting );
2631 } else if( jo.has_string( "set_npc_cbm_recharge_rule" ) ) {
2632 const std::string setting = jo.get_string( "set_npc_cbm_recharge_rule" );
2633 subeffect_fun.set_npc_cbm_recharge_rule( setting );
2634 } else if( jo.has_member( "mapgen_update" ) ) {
2635 subeffect_fun.set_mapgen_update( jo, "mapgen_update" );
2636 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_buy_monster" ) ) {
2637 const std::string &monster_type_id = jo.get_string( "u_buy_monster" );
2638 const int cost = jo.get_int( "cost", 0 );
2639 const int count = jo.get_int( "count", 1 );
2640 const bool pacified = jo.get_bool( "pacified", false );
2641 translation name;
2642 jo.read( "name", name );
2643 subeffect_fun.set_u_buy_monster( monster_type_id, cost, count, pacified, name );
2644 } else if( jo.has_string( "u_learn_recipe" ) ) {
2645 const std::string recipe_id = jo.get_string( "u_learn_recipe" );
2646 subeffect_fun.set_u_learn_recipe( recipe_id );
2647 } else if( jo.has_string( "npc_first_topic" ) ) {
2648 const std::string chat_topic = jo.get_string( "npc_first_topic" );
2649 subeffect_fun.set_npc_first_topic( chat_topic );
2650 } else {
2651 jo.throw_error( "invalid sub effect syntax: " + jo.str() );
2652 }
2653 set_effect( subeffect_fun );
2654}
2655
2656void talk_effect_t::parse_string_effect( const std::string &effect_id, const JsonObject &jo )
2657{
2658 static const std::unordered_map<std::string, void( * )( npc & )> static_functions_map = {
2659 {
2660#define WRAP( function ) { #function, &talk_function::function }
2661 WRAP( assign_mission ),
2662 WRAP( mission_success ),
2663 WRAP( mission_failure ),
2664 WRAP( clear_mission ),
2665 WRAP( mission_reward ),
2666 WRAP( start_trade ),
2667 WRAP( sort_loot ),
2668 WRAP( find_mount ),
2669 WRAP( dismount ),
2670 WRAP( do_chop_plank ),
2671 WRAP( do_vehicle_deconstruct ),
2672 WRAP( do_vehicle_repair ),
2673 WRAP( do_chop_trees ),
2674 WRAP( do_fishing ),
2675 WRAP( do_construction ),
2676 WRAP( do_mining ),
2677 WRAP( do_read ),
2678 WRAP( do_butcher ),
2679 WRAP( do_farming ),
2680 WRAP( assign_guard ),
2681 WRAP( assign_camp ),
2682 WRAP( abandon_camp ),
2683 WRAP( stop_guard ),
2684 WRAP( start_camp ),
2685 WRAP( buy_cow ),
2686 WRAP( buy_chicken ),
2687 WRAP( buy_horse ),
2688 WRAP( recover_camp ),
2689 WRAP( remove_overseer ),
2690 WRAP( basecamp_mission ),
2691 WRAP( wake_up ),
2692 WRAP( reveal_stats ),
2693 WRAP( end_conversation ),
2694 WRAP( insult_combat ),
2695 WRAP( give_equipment ),
2696 WRAP( give_aid ),
2697 WRAP( give_all_aid ),
2698 WRAP( barber_beard ),
2699 WRAP( barber_hair ),
2700 WRAP( buy_haircut ),
2701 WRAP( buy_shave ),
2702 WRAP( morale_chat ),
2703 WRAP( morale_chat_activity ),
2704 WRAP( buy_10_logs ),
2705 WRAP( buy_100_logs ),
2706 WRAP( bionic_install ),
2707 WRAP( bionic_remove ),
2708 WRAP( follow ),
2709 WRAP( follow_only ),
2710 WRAP( deny_follow ),
2711 WRAP( deny_lead ),
2712 WRAP( deny_equipment ),
2713 WRAP( deny_train ),
2714 WRAP( deny_personal_info ),
2715 WRAP( hostile ),
2716 WRAP( flee ),
2717 WRAP( leave ),
2718 WRAP( stop_following ),
2719 WRAP( revert_activity ),
2720 WRAP( goto_location ),
2721 WRAP( stranger_neutral ),
2722 WRAP( start_mugging ),
2723 WRAP( player_leaving ),
2724 WRAP( drop_weapon ),
2725 WRAP( drop_stolen_item ),
2726 WRAP( remove_stolen_status ),
2727 WRAP( player_weapon_away ),
2728 WRAP( player_weapon_drop ),
2729 WRAP( lead_to_safety ),
2730 WRAP( start_training ),
2731 WRAP( copy_npc_rules ),
2732 WRAP( set_npc_pickup ),
2733 WRAP( npc_die ),
2734 WRAP( npc_thankful ),
2735 WRAP( clear_overrides ),
2736 WRAP( nothing )
2737#undef WRAP
2738 }
2739 };
2740 const auto iter = static_functions_map.find( effect_id );
2741 if( iter != static_functions_map.end() ) {
2742 set_effect( iter->second );
2743 return;
2744 }
2745
2746 talk_effect_fun_t subeffect_fun;
2747 if( effect_id == "u_bulk_trade_accept" || effect_id == "npc_bulk_trade_accept" ||
2748 effect_id == "u_bulk_donate" || effect_id == "npc_bulk_donate" ) {
2749 bool is_npc = effect_id == "npc_bulk_trade_accept" || effect_id == "npc_bulk_donate";
2750 bool is_trade = effect_id == "u_bulk_trade_accept" || effect_id == "npc_bulk_trade_accept";
2751 subeffect_fun.set_bulk_trade_accept( is_trade, is_npc );
2752 set_effect( subeffect_fun );
2753 return;
2754 }
2755
2756 if( effect_id == "npc_gets_item" || effect_id == "npc_gets_item_to_use" ) {
2757 bool to_use = effect_id == "npc_gets_item_to_use";
2758 subeffect_fun.set_npc_gets_item( to_use );
2759 set_effect( subeffect_fun );
2760 return;
2761 }
2762
2763 jo.throw_error( "unknown effect string", effect_id );
2764}
2765
2766void talk_effect_t::load_effect( const JsonObject &jo )
2767{
2768 if( jo.has_member( "opinion" ) ) {
2769 JsonIn *ji = jo.get_raw( "opinion" );
2770 // Same format as when saving a game (-:
2771 opinion.deserialize( *ji );
2772 }
2773 if( jo.has_member( "mission_opinion" ) ) {
2774 JsonIn *ji = jo.get_raw( "mission_opinion" );
2775 // Same format as when saving a game (-:
2776 mission_opinion.deserialize( *ji );
2777 }
2778 static const std::string member_name( "effect" );
2779 if( !jo.has_member( member_name ) ) {
2780 return;
2781 } else if( jo.has_string( member_name ) ) {
2782 const std::string type = jo.get_string( member_name );
2783 parse_string_effect( type, jo );
2784 } else if( jo.has_object( member_name ) ) {
2785 JsonObject sub_effect = jo.get_object( member_name );
2786 parse_sub_effect( sub_effect );
2787 } else if( jo.has_array( member_name ) ) {
2788 for( const JsonValue entry : jo.get_array( member_name ) ) {
2789 if( entry.test_string() ) {
2790 const std::string type = entry.get_string();
2791 parse_string_effect( type, jo );
2792 } else if( entry.test_object() ) {
2793 JsonObject sub_effect = entry.get_object();
2794 parse_sub_effect( sub_effect );
2795 } else {
2796 jo.throw_error( "invalid effect array syntax", member_name );
2797 }
2798 }
2799 } else {
2800 jo.throw_error( "invalid effect syntax", member_name );
2801 }
2802}
2803
2804talk_response::talk_response()
2805{
2806 truefalse_condition = []( const dialogue & ) {
2807 return true;
2808 };
2809 mission_selected = nullptr;
2810 skill = skill_id::NULL_ID();
2811 style = matype_id::NULL_ID();
2812 dialogue_spell = spell_id();
2813}
2814
2815talk_response::talk_response( const JsonObject &jo )
2816{
2817 if( jo.has_member( "truefalsetext" ) ) {
2818 JsonObject truefalse_jo = jo.get_object( "truefalsetext" );
2819 read_condition<dialogue>( truefalse_jo, "condition", truefalse_condition, true );
2820 truefalse_jo.read( "true", truetext );
2821 truefalse_jo.read( "false", falsetext );
2822 } else {
2823 jo.read( "text", truetext );
2824 truefalse_condition = []( const dialogue & ) {
2825 return true;
2826 };
2827 }
2828 if( jo.has_member( "trial" ) ) {
2829 JsonObject trial_obj = jo.get_object( "trial" );
2830 trial = talk_trial( trial_obj );
2831 }
2832 if( jo.has_member( "success" ) ) {
2833 JsonObject success_obj = jo.get_object( "success" );
2834 success = talk_effect_t( success_obj );
2835 } else if( jo.has_string( "topic" ) ) {
2836 // This is for simple topic switching without a possible failure
2837 success.next_topic = talk_topic( jo.get_string( "topic" ) );
2838 success.load_effect( jo );
2839 } else if( jo.has_object( "topic" ) ) {
2840 success.next_topic = load_inline_topic( jo.get_object( "topic" ) );
2841 }
2842 if( trial && !jo.has_member( "failure" ) ) {
2843 jo.throw_error( "the failure effect is mandatory if a talk_trial has been defined" );
2844 }
2845 if( jo.has_member( "failure" ) ) {
2846 JsonObject failure_obj = jo.get_object( "failure" );
2847 failure = talk_effect_t( failure_obj );
2848 }
2849
2850 // TODO: mission_selected
2851 // TODO: skill
2852 // TODO: style
2853}
2854
2855json_talk_repeat_response::json_talk_repeat_response( const JsonObject &jo )
2856{
2857 if( jo.has_bool( "is_npc" ) ) {
2858 is_npc = true;
2859 }
2860 if( jo.has_bool( "include_containers" ) ) {
2861 include_containers = true;
2862 }
2863 if( jo.has_string( "for_item" ) ) {
2864 for_item.emplace_back( jo.get_string( "for_item" ) );
2865 } else if( jo.has_array( "for_item" ) ) {
2866 for( const std::string line : jo.get_array( "for_item" ) ) {
2867 for_item.emplace_back( line );
2868 }
2869 } else if( jo.has_string( "for_category" ) ) {
2870 for_category.emplace_back( jo.get_string( "for_category" ) );
2871 } else if( jo.has_array( "for_category" ) ) {
2872 for( const std::string line : jo.get_array( "for_category" ) ) {
2873 for_category.emplace_back( line );
2874 }
2875 } else {
2876 jo.throw_error( "Repeat response with no repeat information!" );
2877 }
2878 if( for_item.empty() && for_category.empty() ) {
2879 jo.throw_error( "Repeat response with empty repeat information!" );
2880 }
2881 if( jo.has_object( "response" ) ) {
2882 JsonObject response_obj = jo.get_object( "response" );
2883 response = json_talk_response( response_obj );
2884 } else {
2885 jo.throw_error( "Repeat response with no response!" );
2886 }
2887}

2910bool json_talk_response::gen_responses( dialogue &d, bool switch_done ) const
2911{
2912 if( !is_switch || !switch_done ) {
2913 if( test_condition( d ) ) {
2914 d.responses.emplace_back( actual_response );
2915 return is_switch && !is_default;
2916 }
2917 }
2918 return false;
2919}
2920
2921// repeat responses always go in front
2922bool json_talk_response::gen_repeat_response( dialogue &d, const itype_id &item_id,
2923 bool switch_done ) const
2924{
2925 if( !is_switch || !switch_done ) {
2926 if( test_condition( d ) ) {
2927 talk_response result = actual_response;
2928 result.success.next_topic.item_type = item_id;
2929 result.failure.next_topic.item_type = item_id;
2930 d.responses.insert( d.responses.begin(), result );
2931 return is_switch && !is_default;
2932 }
2933 }
2934 return false;
2935}

2937static std::string translate_gendered_line(
2938 const std::string &line,
2939 const std::vector<std::string> &relevant_genders,
2940 const dialogue &d
2941)
2942{
2943 GenderMap gender_map;
2944 for( const std::string &subject : relevant_genders ) {
2945 if( subject == "npc" ) {
2946 gender_map[subject] = d.beta->get_grammatical_genders();
2947 } else if( subject == "u" ) {
2948 gender_map[subject] = d.alpha->get_grammatical_genders();
2949 } else {
2950 debugmsg( "Unsupported subject '%s' for grammatical gender in dialogue", subject );
2951 }
2952 }
2953 return gettext_gendered( gender_map, line );
2954}

2956dynamic_line_t dynamic_line_t::from_member( const JsonObject &jo, const std::string &member_name )
2957{
2958 if( jo.has_array( member_name ) ) {
2959 return dynamic_line_t( jo.get_array( member_name ) );
2960 } else if( jo.has_object( member_name ) ) {
2961 return dynamic_line_t( jo.get_object( member_name ) );
2962 } else if( jo.has_string( member_name ) ) {
2963 return dynamic_line_t( jo.get_string( member_name ) );
2964 } else {
2965 return dynamic_line_t{};
2966 }
2967}

2970{
2971 function = [line]( const dialogue & ) {
2972 return _( line );
2973 };

2975
2976dynamic_line_t::dynamic_line_t( const JsonObject &jo )
2977{
2978 if( jo.has_member( "and" ) ) {
2979 std::vector<dynamic_line_t> lines;
2980 for( const JsonValue entry : jo.get_array( "and" ) ) {
2981 if( entry.test_string() ) {
2982 lines.emplace_back( entry.get_string() );
2983 } else if( entry.test_array() ) {
2984 lines.emplace_back( entry.get_array() );
2985 } else if( entry.test_object() ) {
2986 lines.emplace_back( entry.get_object() );
2987 } else {
2988 entry.throw_error( "invalid format: must be string, array or object" );
2989 }
2990 }
2991 function = [lines]( const dialogue & d ) {
2992 std::string all_lines;
2993 for( const dynamic_line_t &line : lines ) {
2994 all_lines += line( d );
2995 }
2996 return all_lines;
2997 };
2998 } else if( jo.get_bool( "give_hint", false ) ) {
2999 function = [&]( const dialogue & ) {
3000 return get_hint();
3001 };
3002 } else if( jo.get_bool( "use_reason", false ) ) {
3003 function = [&]( const dialogue & d ) {
3004 std::string tmp = d.reason;
3005 d.reason.clear();
3006 return tmp;
3007 };
3008 } else if( jo.has_string( "gendered_line" ) ) {
3009 const std::string line = jo.get_string( "gendered_line" );
3010 if( !jo.has_array( "relevant_genders" ) ) {
3011 jo.throw_error(
3012 R"(dynamic line with "gendered_line" must also have "relevant_genders")" );
3013 }
3014 std::vector<std::string> relevant_genders;
3015 for( const std::string gender : jo.get_array( "relevant_genders" ) ) {
3016 relevant_genders.push_back( gender );
3017 if( gender != "npc" && gender != "u" ) {
3018 jo.throw_error( "Unexpected subject in relevant_genders; expected 'npc' or 'u'" );
3019 }
3020 }
3021 function = [line, relevant_genders]( const dialogue & d ) {
3022 return translate_gendered_line( line, relevant_genders, d );
3023 };
3024 } else {
3025 conditional_t<dialogue> dcondition;
3026 const dynamic_line_t yes = from_member( jo, "yes" );
3027 const dynamic_line_t no = from_member( jo, "no" );
3028 for( const std::string &sub_member : dialogue_data::simple_string_conds ) {
3029 if( jo.has_bool( sub_member ) ) {
3030 // This also marks the member as visited.
3031 if( !jo.get_bool( sub_member ) ) {
3032 jo.throw_error( "value must be true", sub_member );
3033 }
3034 dcondition = conditional_t<dialogue>( sub_member );
3035 function = [dcondition, yes, no]( const dialogue & d ) {
3036 return ( dcondition( d ) ? yes : no )( d );
3037 };
3038 return;
3039 } else if( jo.has_member( sub_member ) ) {
3040 dcondition = conditional_t<dialogue>( sub_member );
3041 const dynamic_line_t yes_member = from_member( jo, sub_member );
3042 function = [dcondition, yes_member, no]( const dialogue & d ) {
3043 return ( dcondition( d ) ? yes_member : no )( d );
3044 };
3045 return;
3046 }
3047 }
3048 for( const std::string &sub_member : dialogue_data::complex_conds ) {
3049 if( jo.has_member( sub_member ) ) {
3050 dcondition = conditional_t<dialogue>( jo );
3051 function = [dcondition, yes, no]( const dialogue & d ) {
3052 return ( dcondition( d ) ? yes : no )( d );
3053 };
3054 return;
3055 }
3056 }
3057 jo.throw_error( "dynamic line not supported" );
3058 }
3059}
3060
3061dynamic_line_t::dynamic_line_t( JsonArray ja )
3062{
3063 std::vector<dynamic_line_t> lines;
3064 for( const JsonValue entry : ja ) {
3065 if( entry.test_string() ) {
3066 lines.emplace_back( entry.get_string() );
3067 } else if( entry.test_array() ) {
3068 lines.emplace_back( entry.get_array() );
3069 } else if( entry.test_object() ) {
3070 lines.emplace_back( entry.get_object() );
3071 } else {
3072 entry.throw_error( "invalid format: must be string, array or object" );
3073 }
3074 }
3075 function = [lines]( const dialogue & d ) {
3076 const dynamic_line_t &line = random_entry_ref( lines );
3077 return line( d );
3078 };
3079}
3080
3081json_dynamic_line_effect::json_dynamic_line_effect( const JsonObject &jo, const std::string &id )
3082{
3083 std::function<bool( const dialogue & )> tmp_condition;
3084 read_condition<dialogue>( jo, "condition", tmp_condition, true );
3085 talk_effect_t tmp_effect = talk_effect_t( jo );
3086 // if the topic has a sentinel, it means implicitly add a check for the sentinel value
3087 // and do not run the effects if it is set. if it is not set, run the effects and
3088 // set the sentinel
3089 if( jo.has_string( "sentinel" ) ) {
3090 const std::string sentinel = jo.get_string( "sentinel" );
3091 const std::string varname = "npctalk_var_sentinel_" + id + "_" + sentinel;
3092 condition = [varname, tmp_condition]( const dialogue & d ) {
3093 return d.alpha->get_value( varname ) != "yes" && tmp_condition( d );
3094 };
3095 std::function<void( const dialogue &d )> function = [varname]( const dialogue & d ) {
3096 d.alpha->set_value( varname, "yes" );
3097 };
3098 tmp_effect.effects.emplace_back( function );
3099 } else {
3100 condition = tmp_condition;
3101 }
3102 effect = tmp_effect;
3103}
3104
3105bool json_dynamic_line_effect::test_condition( const dialogue &d ) const
3106{
3107 return condition( d );
3108}
3109
3110void json_dynamic_line_effect::apply( dialogue &d ) const
3111{
3112 effect.apply( d );
3113}
3114
3115void json_talk_topic::load( const JsonObject &jo )
3116{
3117 if( jo.has_member( "dynamic_line" ) ) {
3118 dynamic_line = dynamic_line_t::from_member( jo, "dynamic_line" );
3119 }
3120 if( jo.has_member( "speaker_effect" ) ) {
3121 std::string id = "no_id";
3122 if( jo.has_string( "id" ) ) {
3123 id = jo.get_string( "id" );
3124 } else if( jo.has_array( "id" ) ) {
3125 id = jo.get_array( "id" ).next_string();
3126 }
3127 if( jo.has_object( "speaker_effect" ) ) {
3128 JsonObject speaker_effect = jo.get_object( "speaker_effect" );
3129 speaker_effects.emplace_back( speaker_effect, id );
3130 } else if( jo.has_array( "speaker_effect" ) ) {
3131 for( JsonObject speaker_effect : jo.get_array( "speaker_effect" ) ) {
3132 speaker_effects.emplace_back( speaker_effect, id );
3133 }
3134 }
3135 }
3136 for( JsonObject response : jo.get_array( "responses" ) ) {
3137 responses.emplace_back( response );
3138 }
3139 if( jo.has_object( "repeat_responses" ) ) {
3140 repeat_responses.emplace_back( jo.get_object( "repeat_responses" ) );
3141 } else if( jo.has_array( "repeat_responses" ) ) {
3142 for( JsonObject elem : jo.get_array( "repeat_responses" ) ) {
3143 repeat_responses.emplace_back( elem );
3144 }
3145 }
3146 if( responses.empty() ) {
3147 jo.throw_error( "no responses for talk topic defined", "responses" );
3148 }
3149 replace_built_in_responses = jo.get_bool( "replace_built_in_responses",
3150 replace_built_in_responses );
3151}
3152
3153bool json_talk_topic::gen_responses( dialogue &d ) const
3154{
3155 d.responses.reserve( responses.size() ); // A wild guess, can actually be more or less
3156
3157 bool switch_done = false;
3158 for( auto &r : responses ) {
3159 switch_done |= r.gen_responses( d, switch_done );
3160 }
3161 for( const json_talk_repeat_response &repeat : repeat_responses ) {
3162 player *actor = d.alpha;
3163 if( repeat.is_npc ) {
3164 actor = dynamic_cast<player *>( d.beta );
3165 }
3166 std::function<bool( const item & )> filter = return_true<item>;
3167 for( const itype_id &item_id : repeat.for_item ) {
3168 if( actor->charges_of( item_id ) > 0 || actor->has_amount( item_id, 1 ) ) {
3169 switch_done |= repeat.response.gen_repeat_response( d, item_id, switch_done );
3170 }
3171 }
3172 for( const item_category_id &category_id : repeat.for_category ) {
3173 const bool include_containers = repeat.include_containers;
3174 const auto items_with = actor->items_with( [category_id,
3175 include_containers]( const item & it ) {
3176 if( include_containers ) {
3177 return it.get_category().get_id() == category_id;
3178 }
3179 return it.type && it.type->category_force == category_id;
3180 } );
3181 for( const auto &it : items_with ) {
3182 switch_done |= repeat.response.gen_repeat_response( d, it->typeId(), switch_done );
3183 }
3184 }
3185 }
3186
3187 return replace_built_in_responses;
3188}

3222
3223std::string npc::pick_talk_topic( const player &/*u*/ )
3224{
3225 if( personality.aggression > 0 ) {
3226 if( op_of_u.fear * 2 < personality.bravery && personality.altruism < 0 ) {
3227 set_attitude( NPCATT_MUG );
3228 return "TALK_MUG";
3229 }
3230
3231 if( personality.aggression + personality.bravery - op_of_u.fear > 0 ) {
3232 return "TALK_STRANGER_AGGRESSIVE";
3233 }
3234 }
3235
3236 if( op_of_u.fear * 2 > personality.altruism + personality.bravery ) {
3237 return "TALK_STRANGER_SCARED";
3238 }
3239
3240 if( op_of_u.fear * 2 > personality.bravery + op_of_u.trust ) {
3241 return "TALK_STRANGER_WARY";
3242 }
3243
3244 if( op_of_u.trust - op_of_u.fear +
3245 ( personality.bravery + personality.altruism ) / 2 > 0 ) {
3246 return "TALK_STRANGER_FRIENDLY";
3247 }
3248
3249 set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
3250 return "TALK_STRANGER_NEUTRAL";
3251}
3252
3253enum consumption_result {
3254 REFUSED = 0,
3255 CONSUMED_SOME, // Consumption didn't fail, but don't delete the item
3256 CONSUMED_ALL // Consumption succeeded, delete the item
3257};
3258
3259// Returns true if we destroyed the item through consumption
3260static consumption_result try_consume( npc &p, item &it, std::string &reason )
3261{
3262 // TODO: Unify this with 'player::consume_item()'
3263 bool consuming_contents = it.is_container() && !it.contents.empty();
3264 item &to_eat = consuming_contents ? it.contents.front() : it;
3265 const auto &comest = to_eat.get_comestible();
3266 if( !comest ) {
3267 // Don't inform the player that we don't want to eat the lighter
3268 return REFUSED;
3269 }
3270
3271 if( !p.will_accept_from_player( it ) ) {
3272 reason = _( "I don't <swear> trust you enough to eat THIS…" );
3273 return REFUSED;
3274 }
3275
3276 // TODO: Make it not a copy+paste from player::consume_item
3277 int amount_used = 1;
3278 if( to_eat.is_food() ) {
3279 if( !p.eat( to_eat ) ) {
3280 reason = _( "It doesn't look like a good idea to consume this…" );
3281 return REFUSED;
3282 } else {
3283 reason = _( "Thanks, that hit the spot." );
3284 }
3285 } else if( to_eat.is_medication() || to_eat.get_contained().is_medication() ) {
3286 if( comest->tool ) {
3287 bool has = p.has_amount( comest->tool, 1 );
3288 if( item::count_by_charges( comest->tool ) ) {
3289 has = p.has_charges( comest->tool, 1 );
3290 }
3291 if( !has ) {
3292 reason = string_format( _( "I need a %s to consume that!" ),
3293 item::nname( comest->tool ) );
3294 return REFUSED;
3295 }
3296 p.use_charges( comest->tool, 1 );
3297 reason = _( "Thanks, I feel better already." );
3298 }
3299 if( to_eat.type->has_use() ) {
3300 amount_used = to_eat.type->invoke( p, to_eat, p.pos() );
3301 if( amount_used <= 0 ) {
3302 reason = _( "It doesn't look like a good idea to consume this…" );
3303 return REFUSED;
3304 }
3305 reason = _( "Thanks, I used it." );
3306 }
3307
3308 to_eat.charges -= amount_used;
3309 p.consume_effects( to_eat );
3310 p.moves -= 250;
3311 } else {
3312 debugmsg( "Unknown comestible type of item: %s\n", to_eat.tname() );
3313 }
3314
3315 if( to_eat.charges > 0 ) {
3316 return CONSUMED_SOME;
3317 }
3318
3319 if( consuming_contents ) {
3320 it.remove_item( it.contents.front() );
3321 return CONSUMED_SOME;
3322 }
3323
3324 // If not consuming contents and charge <= 0, we just ate the last charge from the stack
3325 return CONSUMED_ALL;
3326}
3327
3328std::string give_item_to( npc &p, bool allow_use )
3329{
3330 if( p.is_hallucination() ) {
3331 return _( "No thanks, I'm good." );
3332 }
3333 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_menu( g->u, _( "Offer what?" ),
3334 _( "You have no items to offer." ) );
3335 if( !loc ) {
3336 return _( "Changed your mind?" );
3337 }
3338 item &given = *loc;
3339
3340 if( ( &given == &g->u.weapon && given.has_flag( "NO_UNWIELD" ) ) || ( g->u.is_worn( given ) &&
3341 given.has_flag( "NO_TAKEOFF" ) ) ) {
3342 // Bionic weapon or shackles
3343 return _( "How?" );
3344 }
3345
3346 if( given.is_dangerous() && !g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL ) ) {
3347 return _( "Are you <swear> insane!?" );
3348 }
3349
3350 bool taken = false;
3351 std::string reason = _( "Nope." );
3352 int our_ammo = p.ammo_count_for( p.weapon );
3353 int new_ammo = p.ammo_count_for( given );
3354 const double new_weapon_value = p.weapon_value( given, new_ammo );
3355 const double cur_weapon_value = p.weapon_value( p.weapon, our_ammo );
3356 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC evaluates own %s (%d ammo): %0.1f",
3357 p.weapon.typeId().str(), our_ammo, cur_weapon_value );
3358 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC evaluates your %s (%d ammo): %0.1f",
3359 given.typeId().str(), new_ammo, new_weapon_value );
3360 if( allow_use ) {
3361 // Eating first, to avoid evaluating bread as a weapon
3362 const auto consume_res = try_consume( p, given, reason );
3363 if( consume_res != REFUSED ) {
3364 if( consume_res == CONSUMED_ALL ) {
3365 g->u.i_rem( &given );
3366 }
3367 g->u.moves -= 100;
3368 if( given.is_container() ) {
3369 given.on_contents_changed();
3370 }
3371 }// wield it if its a weapon
3372 else if( new_weapon_value > cur_weapon_value ) {
3373 p.wield( given );
3374 reason = _( "Thanks, I'll wield that now." );
3375 taken = true;
3376 }// HACK: is_gun here is a hack to prevent NPCs wearing guns if they don't want to use them
3377 else if( !given.is_gun() && given.is_armor() ) {
3378 //if it is impossible to wear return why
3379 ret_val<bool> can_wear = p.can_wear( given, true );
3380 if( !can_wear.success() ) {
3381 reason = can_wear.str();
3382 } else {
3383 //if we can wear it with equip changes prompt first
3384 can_wear = p.can_wear( given );
3385 if( ( can_wear.success() ||
3386 query_yn( can_wear.str() + _( " Should I take something off?" ) ) )
3387 && p.wear_if_wanted( given, reason ) ) {
3388 taken = true;
3389 } else {
3390 reason = can_wear.str();
3391 }
3392 }
3393 } else {
3394 reason += string_format(
3395 _( "My current weapon is better than this.\n(new weapon value: %.1f vs %.1f)." ), new_weapon_value,
3396 cur_weapon_value );
3397 }
3398 } else {//allow_use is false so try to carry instead
3399 if( p.can_pick_volume( given ) && p.can_pick_weight( given ) ) {
3400 reason = _( "Thanks, I'll carry that now." );
3401 taken = true;
3402 p.i_add( given );
3403 } else {
3404 if( !p.can_pick_volume( given ) ) {
3405 const units::volume free_space = p.volume_capacity() - p.volume_carried();
3406 reason += "\n" + std::string( _( "I have no space to store it." ) ) + "\n";
3407 if( free_space > 0_ml ) {
3408 reason += string_format( _( "I can only store %s %s more." ),
3409 format_volume( free_space ), volume_units_long() );
3410 } else {
3411 reason += _( "…or to store anything else for that matter." );
3412 }
3413 }
3414 if( !p.can_pick_weight( given ) ) {
3415 reason += std::string( "\n" ) + _( "It is too heavy for me to carry." );
3416 }
3417 }
3418 }
3419
3420 if( taken ) {
3421 g->u.i_rem( &given );
3422 g->u.moves -= 100;
3423 p.has_new_items = true;
3424 }
3425
3426 return reason;
3427}

3433
3434bool npc::item_name_whitelisted( const std::string &to_match )
3435{
3436 if( !has_item_whitelist() ) {
3437 return true;
3438 }
3439
3440 auto &wlist = *rules.pickup_whitelist;
3441 const auto rule = wlist.check_item( to_match );
3442 if( rule == RULE_WHITELISTED ) {
3443 return true;
3444 }
3445
3446 if( rule == RULE_BLACKLISTED ) {
3447 return false;
3448 }
3449
3450 wlist.create_rule( to_match );
3451 return wlist.check_item( to_match ) == RULE_WHITELISTED;
3452}
3453
3454bool npc::item_whitelisted( const item &it )
3455{
3456 if( !has_item_whitelist() ) {
3457 return true;
3458 }
3459
3460 const auto to_match = it.tname( 1, false );
3461 return item_name_whitelisted( to_match );
3462}
